string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_TD_Commander_Li_01
string.body: In the name of Lord Kaisinel: Daevas, hold your position!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_TD_Commander_Li_02
string.body: He came here to fight me? What a fool!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_TD_Commander_Li_03
string.body: Are you making fun of me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_TD_Commander_Li_04
string.body: Keep going! Once we get rid of him, victory will be ours!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_TD_Commander_Da_01
string.body: In the name of Lord Marchutan: Daevas, hold your position!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_TD_Commander_Da_02
string.body: He came here to fight me? What a fool!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_TD_Commander_Da_03
string.body: Are you making fun of me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_TD_Commander_Da_04
string.body: Keep going! Once we get rid of him, victory will be ours!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_TD_DragonRider_01
string.body: Gyaooo!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss1_01
string.body: With these powers I could even become the fifth Dragon Lord.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss1_02
string.body: That monstrous beast must be punished, don't you think?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss1_03
string.body: I'll tame you too, just like these children.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss1_04
string.body: You'll scream just like those wretched members of the Rune Tribe!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss1_05
string.body: Here is your reward for persevering for so long. Listen to the screams of the Rune Tribe!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss1_06
string.body: You won't even be able to scream again!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss1_07
string.body: Hahaha ... a Balaur Lord ...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss1_kcast5_b
string.body: What do you think about that? Isn't it exciting?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss1_kcast7_b
string.body: The shrill cries of the spirits that I control ...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss1_katk7_b
string.body: Can you hear those screams?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss2_01
string.body: That is Sita's wish ...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss2_02
string.body: Weaklings! I will destroy you myself!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss2_03
string.body: Activate shield! Protect me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss2_04
string.body: I'm Achradim, the Steel Wall Protector!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss2_05
string.body: You're very persistent. Allow me to demonstrate my power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss2_06
string.body: Attack is the best form of defence! Don't give them any time to breathe!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss2_07
string.body: I will protect this place with my victory.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss2_08
string.body: Achradim Gossip TEMP

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss3_01
string.body: Whoa! These blasted Ruhn .... When did they learn these skills ...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss3_02
string.body: Hehehe... Nobody in this amount of pain can keep their secrets hidden long.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss3_Katk6_b
string.body: You need not fear. It won't even hurt!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss3_Katk7_b
string.body: You need not fear. It won't even hurt!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss3_Kcast5_b
string.body: Who ... who are you? Wait a moment ... who ... who am I?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss3_Katk5_b
string.body: I am the Redeemer! I'll soon show you what it means to be defenceless!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss4_01
string.body: Weaklings like you should offer themselves to Sita as test subjects.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss4_02
string.body: An intruder? Tsk. At moments like these, even weaklings can be of some use.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss4_03
string.body: Everyone who can still move must help me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss4_04
string.body: Who ever relied on the help of weaklings?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss4_05
string.body: You will help me to regain my honour!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss4_06
string.body: It's over.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss5_01
string.body: The cool things belong to Shugo, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss5_02
string.body: Shugo mustn't be disturbed, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss5_03
string.body: Don't follow me! Akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss5_04
string.body: Can you act like you didn't see anything?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss5_05
string.body: There ... that ought to stop them ... ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Boss5_06
string.body: Luck seems to have left Shugo, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Vri_Post_1st_Start_Gossip
string.body: You dare to attack me?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Vri_Post_1st_End_Gossip
string.body: Honour to Beritra!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Vri_Post_1st_Skill_Gossip
string.body: Feel death's embrace!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Vri_Post_2nd_Start_Gossip
string.body: Now I've got you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Vri_Post_2nd_End_Gossip
string.body: Curses ... I can do a lot more ...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Vri_Post_2nd_Skill_Gossip
string.body: Haha! Die by my sword!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Vri_Post_3rd_Start_Gossip
string.body: You dare to attack me?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Vri_Post_3rd_End_Gossip
string.body: Is it already time to go ...?

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Vri_Post_3rd_Skill_Gossip
string.body: Feel death's embrace!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Vri_1stBoss_Start_Gossip
string.body: You dared to come here ... You are brave, I'll give you that.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Vri_1stBoss_End_Gossip
string.body: Honour to Beritra!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Vri_1stBoss_Skill_Gossip
string.body: Keep going!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Vri_1stBoss_Skill2_Gossip
string.body: I'll show you how strong I am.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Shulack_Keeper_01_Batk
string.body: Wha ... what? Wh ... who are you?

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Shulack_Keeper_02_Braod
string.body: If Shugo finds out, I really will have a problem. Get rid of it quickly!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Shulack_Keeper_03_Katk_b
string.body: Down with you, in the name of the Queen!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Shulack_Keeper_04_Broad
string.body: The queen will not be amused. Stop it!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Shulack_Keeper_05_Gossip
string.body: What are you doing here? You're disturbing me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Ratman_01_Katk1_b
string.body: Help me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Ratman_02_Broad
string.body: MuMu! MuMu!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Ratman_03_Gossip
string.body: Shugo sent me home. I have taken care of everything I was asked to do.

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Ratman_04_Katk2_b
string.body: Dead!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Ratman_05_Idle_b
string.body: I want to go home!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Brownie_01_Katk1_b
string.body: Kobold is dying! Needs help!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Brownie_02_Broad
string.body: Poor Kobold ... Don't hit me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Brownie_03_Gossip
string.body: Kobold not guilty! Stop it!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Brownie_04_Katk2_b
string.body: Is not Kobold's fault! Kobold wants to go home ...

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Brownie_05_Idle_b
string.body: Kobold is homesick.

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Drakan_As_Broad_01
string.body: Attack from two sides!

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Drakan_As_Broad_02
string.body: The enemy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Drakan_As_Broad_03
string.body: You dare to give me orders?

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Drakan_As_Broad_04
string.body: You will die scared and alone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Lizard_Broad_01
string.body: We will attack from both sides.

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Lizard_Broad_02
string.body: Attack our enemies.

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Lizard_Broad_03
string.body: You have no authority over me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Lizard_Broad_04
string.body: I was ordered not to give any orders.

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Drakan_1_Batk_b
string.body: No Daeva can defeat me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Drakan_2_Batk_b
string.body: You're a fool!

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Lizard_1_Batk_b
string.body: Your death means my survival.

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Lizard_2_Batk_b
string.body: You can't give up that easily.

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Drakan_1_Die_b
string.body: If only Tiamat were here ...

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Drakan_2_Die_b
string.body: Is this how it ends for me? How unpleasant ...

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Lizard_1_Die_b
string.body: I ... don't ... want to die.

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Lizard_2_Die_b
string.body: I came to kill you ... but I failed.

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Drakan_SemiNamed_1_Batk_b
string.body: A puny little Daeva dares to attack me?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Drakan_SemiNamed_2_Batk_b
string.body: You will be nothing but ash beneath the feet of the Tiamat Legion!

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Drakan_SemiNamed_1_Die_b
string.body: By a Daeva ... I ...

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Drakan_SemiNamed_2_Die_b
string.body: I ... I can't go like this.

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Drakan_BrainWashing_1_Batk_b
string.body: B ... Beritra ... Beritra ...

string.name: STR_CHAT_TR_Drakan_BrainWashing_1_Die_b
string.body: Beritra ...? Tiama ...

string.body: Zzzz ...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF5b_Ratman_Sleep_02
string.body: Why am I so tired ... MuMu ...

string.body: Hey! No entry without a permit!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRose_L_ShulackF_Ri_S_N_1_Eatk_b
string.body: Hmmpf! Nothing to speak of.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRose_L_ShulackF_Ri_S_N_1_Die_b
string.body: The machine must be serviced.

string.body: Groan, groan ...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRose_M_ShugoM_Fi_S_SN_1_Batk_b

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRose_M_ShugoM_Fi_S_SN_1_Die_b

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRose_M_ShugoM_Wi_S_N_1_Eatk_b
string.body: There is still so much counting to do, Shugo has wasted time!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRose_M_ShugoM_Wi_S_N_1_Die_b
string.body: That hurts ... ak!

string.body: Shugo transform!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRose_M_ShugoM_Wi_S_N_2_Katk2_b
string.body: Nyahaha!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRose_M_ShugoM_Wi_S_N_1_Kcast3_b
string.body: Situation critical, very critical ... akakak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRose_M_ShugoM_Wi_S_N_2_Katk3_b
string.body: Make yourself useful, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRose_H_Boss_Mu_P_N_Die_b

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRose_H_Boss_Mu_P_N_2_Kcast2_b
string.body: Whoa! You're not bad.

string.body: I can't stand disharmony!

string.body: I don't want to die ...

string.body: Gaaaaar!

string.body: Krrng!

string.body: Gaaaaar!

string.body: The Rakuris stick together!

string.body: You have helped my friend!

string.name: STR_CHAT_BLDF5_Zombie_01_Die_b

string.body: Ungh!

string.body: You are greedy, grrr!

string.body: Accept the inheritance.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDKamar_DrakanGeneral_Die

string.body: Argh... Beritra ...

string.body: The enemy has broken through! Protect the Artillery!

string.body: The artillery is under attack! Stop the tank!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5U1_VriIU_Wi_SN_Gossip_02
string.body: No! The Artillery... the Artillery!

string.body: For Sita...

string.body: Turn yourself into a Qooqoo!

string.body: Shugo wants to see what you've got, ak!

string.body: The enemy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5U2_DGuard_Batk_b
string.body: The enemy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5U2_VriIU_Wi_N_Batk_b
string.body: That miserable wretch!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5U2_VriIU_Wi_N_Die_b
string.body: I can barely see him...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5U2_VriRP_As_N_Die_b
string.body: Argh... how irritating...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5U2_VriRP_Pr_N_Die_b
string.body: For... Beritra ...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5U2_ShugoM_SN_Batk_b

string.body: Pah! Turn yourself into a Qooqoo!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5U2_ShogoM_SN_Die_b
string.body: The mercenaries are helpless... ak...

string.body: Groan, groan ...

string.body: Please don't bother us any more!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5U2_ShulackF_Ri_SN_Kcast6_b

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5U2_ShulackF_As_Die_b

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd1_01
string.body: Ha! Finally my chance to be victorious has come!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd1_02
string.body: I'll prove that I'm more capable than Obanuka!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd1_03
string.body: My chance... ah...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd2_01
string.body: So I really did hear Rohuka's screams...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd2_02
string.body: Target locked.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd2_03
string.body: Fire!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd2_04
string.body: Now you'll find out for yourself what my Fire Cannon can do!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd2_05
string.body: I could use another Fire Cannon...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd3_01
string.body: Impressive that you made it this far!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd3_02
string.body: My research results can't be wrong!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd3_03
string.body: We're all going to die!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd3_Katk6_b
string.body: Here's a small taste of my research results for you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd4_01
string.body: I've been expecting you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd4_02
string.body: You won't get past me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd4_03
string.body: I must not disappoint Moriata!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd4_04
string.body: Moriata... I am so ashamed...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd5_01
string.body: You will only meet your death here.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd5_02
string.body: My defence is legendary!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd5_03
string.body: You are... really incredible.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd6_01
string.body: Since you managed to defeat Rohuka, you now have the honour of dying by my hand!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd6_02
string.body: How dare you come here and challenge me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd6_03
string.body: I will show you the power of the Escort!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd6_04
string.body: I can't believe it. I can't be worse than Rohuka...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd7_01
string.body: You should have acted like you hadn't seen anything...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd7_02
string.body: I will soon dispatch you to the next world.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd7_03
string.body: Give up and die!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd7_04
string.body: Fool... It is an honour to die by my hand...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd8_01
string.body: The fact that you made it this far only shows that I'm surrounded by weaklings!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd8_02
string.body: One does not become Chief of Staff easily!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd8_03
string.body: Wisdom and power are the properties of a perfect leader! And that applies to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Nmd8_04
string.body: I lost... This is impossible...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_As_Batk_b
string.body: Intruders... Destroy them all!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Fi_Batk_b
string.body: You must be tired of living to come here.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Wi_Batk_b
string.body: You're probably looking for a suitable place to die!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Ri_Batk_b
string.body: You dare to come here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Gu_Batk_b
string.body: You must be tired of living to come here.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Pr_Batk_b
string.body: You're probably looking for a suitable place to die!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Ba_Batk_b
string.body: You dare to come here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave1_Boss_Ri_01
string.body: Charge!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave1_Boss_Ri_02
string.body: Did you somehow think the Pashid Unit would be so easy to stop?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave1_Boss_Ri_03
string.body: Long live Beritra!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave1_Boss_El_01
string.body: You'll get a taste of our Exploding Beetle!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave1_Boss_El_02
string.body: No... it isn't over yet.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave1_Boss_El_03
string.body: Teselik... I'm sorry.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave2_Boss_Wi_01
string.body: These Daevas are weak. Eliminate them!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave2_Boss_Wi_02
string.body: The famed Beritra Army cannot be stopped!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave2_Boss_Wi_03
string.body: Ungh... the attack failed...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave2_Boss_Gu_01
string.body: Attack!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave2_Boss_Gu_02
string.body: Are we supposed to put down roots here?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave2_Boss_Gu_03
string.body: For you there is... no more hope.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave3_Boss_Ri_01
string.body: Now you will see the true worth of the Pashid Unit!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave3_Boss_Ri_02
string.body: Do your best!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave3_Boss_Ri_03
string.body: Honour to Beritra!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave3_Boss_As_01
string.body: Muwahaha! The attack was a success! Destroy them all!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave3_Boss_As_02
string.body: Do not underestimate the might of the Pashid Unit!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave3_Boss_As_03
string.body: No! Not yet!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Wave3_Boss_As_04
string.body: The Attack Squad will march on even without me...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Headquater_Fi_01
string.body: The enemy! Defend the headquarters!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Headquater_Fi_02
string.body: On my honour, I will defend this place!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Headquater_Fi_03
string.body: I didn't expect an attack by Daevas...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Headquater_Fi_04
string.body: It's too late... to capture this place... Pashid is... long since...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Assult_Batk_b
string.body: We are the strongest unit of the Beritra Army

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Siege_Batk_b
string.body: Anyone who insults the pride of the Pashid Unit must be punished for it!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5b_TD_Nor_Batk_b
string.body: You got in the way of the glorious Beritra Army... now you will pay for it!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_TD_War_Boss_01
string.body: You dare to challenge me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_TD_War_Boss_02
string.body: I will break your pride!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_TD_War_Boss_03
string.body: You cannot defeat me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_TD_War_Boss_04
string.body: You don't stand a chance. I will triumph!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Gab1_Sub_Boss_01
string.body: For Beritra! Kneel before me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Gab1_Sub_Boss_02
string.body: Muahahaha! Feel my power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Gab1_Sub_Boss_03
string.body: Argh, this pain... my head...

string.name: STR_CHAT_Gab1_Sub_Boss_04
string.body: Fregion! I will never forgive you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Gab1_Sub_Boss_05
string.body: Why? Ereshkigal?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Gab1_Sub_Boss_06
string.body: Get lost, you stinking vermin!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Gab1_Sub_Boss_07
string.body: Time is running out, the Ascension is failing... Lord Beritra!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Gab1_Sub_Boss_08
string.body: Witness the destruction. Look!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Gab1_Sub_Boss_09
string.body: My Ascension... so close...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF5_Under_Dunguroong_01_Idle_b
string.body: Go to Akaron if you want to travel to the Rune Shield Tower, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF5_Under_Dunguroong_02_Idle_b
string.body: Go to Akaron and look for the Rune Shield Tower Corridor, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4_Advance_Popoku_Leader_E_Gossip_01_Idle_S
string.body: Phew! I'm here to protect Akaron!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4_Advance_Popoku_Leader_E_Gossip_02_Idle_S
string.body: The divine revelation proclaims that the Elyos Union will win.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4_Advance_Popoku_Leader_E_Gossip_03_Idle_S
string.body: Phew... The amateurish Asmodian Union doesn't have a strategy.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4_Advance_Chapire_Leader_E_Gossip_01_Idle_S
string.body: They came from Akaron to drive out the Elyos and the Asmodians! Chapa!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4_Advance_Chapire_Leader_E_Gossip_02_Idle_S
string.body: I will show you the power of the Asmodian Union! Chapa!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF4_Advance_Chapire_Leader_E_Gossip_03_Idle_S
string.body: The weak Elyos Union is nothing worth speaking of. Chapa!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Inform_Gossip_01
string.body: You can travel to the Sauro War Depot from Akaron.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDVritra_Base_Inform_Gossip_02
string.body: Go to Akaron if you want to travel to the Sauro War Depot.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDStation_Guide_01
string.body: Intruders! The power generator has been destroyed!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDStation_Guide_02
string.body: We must protect the power generator!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_01
string.body: Have you come to seek the treasure?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_02
string.body: We have to stop them! The treasure is ours!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_03
string.body: Tedious folk!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_04
string.body: We're not sharing with you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_05
string.body: The Shugos are here to get the treasure!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_06
string.body: We're not going without the treasure!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_07
string.body: The Shugo Emperor's treasure belongs to us!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_08
string.body: Look, the Knights of the Shugo Round Table!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_09
string.body: Hey, hand something over!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_10
string.body: The gold calls to me...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_11
string.body: You'll never get rid of us!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_12
string.body: Tre... Treasure...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_13
string.body: Stay out of my way!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_14
string.body: Foolish Shugos... Give up!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_15
string.body: The Emperor is dead, what does he want with the treasure now?

string.name: STR_MSG_IDStation_A_Boom_Dispel
string.body: Intruders! Destroy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Npc_Gossip_01
string.body: Something terrible has happened! Help, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Npc_Gossip_02
string.body: Daevas must protect the Emperor's treasure, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Npc_Gossip_03
string.body: Daevas saved us! Shugo will reward you, ak, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_16
string.body: We won't give up...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_17
string.body: Don't let them pass!

string.name: STR_CHAT_EVENT_SNAKE_01
string.body: Hey, you there... Yeah, you... Come here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_18
string.body: Intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_19
string.body: Don't let them pass!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_20
string.body: Collect the treasure! Pack it all up!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSweep_Monster_Gossip_21
string.body: To them!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Twin_P_Gossip_01
string.body: As long as my comrade is at my side, I cannot lose!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Twin_P_Gossip_02
string.body: Stand up, servant!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Twin_P_Gossip_03
string.body: Squirm in agony!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Twin_P_Gossip_04
string.body: I'm returning to the energy source...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Twin_M_Gossip_01
string.body: With my comrades at my side, I cannot lose!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Twin_M_Gossip_02
string.body: Demonstrate your power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Twin_M_Gossip_03
string.body: Show me your true colours!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Twin_M_Gossip_04
string.body: Help your master!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Twin_M_Gossip_05
string.body: I'm returning to the energy source...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Wave_Fi_Pulled
string.body: I'm going to fight!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Wave_Wi_Sleep
string.body: Go to sleep at last!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Wave_Pr_Heal
string.body: No chance!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Wave_Leader_Guardian
string.body: I'll protect you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Wave_Leader_CaseHeal
string.body: Help me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Wave_Leader_Buff
string.body: Come with me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_01
string.body: How dare you get in Beritra's way?

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_02
string.body: It is futile!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_03
string.body: For Beritra!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_04
string.body: It cannot... be..., you...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_05
string.body: For... Beritra!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_06
string.body: We're not letting anyone through!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_07
string.body: Obey the command!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_08
string.body: Nobody... may enter...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_09
string.body: Kill... the intruders...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_10
string.body: Protect... the Aetheric Field...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_11
string.body: Submit!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_12
string.body: The curse... will live on...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_13
string.body: Be gone...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_14
string.body: This is... the end...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_15
string.body: Tiamat has been betrayed...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_16
string.body: Stop the Daevas!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_17
string.body: You won't get through here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_18
string.body: For Beritra!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_19
string.body: This place is cursed...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_20
string.body: Death to the intruders...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_21
string.body: Away with you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_22
string.body: Release me from this curse.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_23
string.body: Begone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_24
string.body: This is the end...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_25
string.body: Tiamat...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_26
string.body: I'm guarding this place.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_27
string.body: The curse lives on.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_28
string.body: I'm finally free.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_29
string.body: You will die!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_30
string.body: Resistance is futile!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_31
string.body: Don't you dare come any closer!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_32
string.body: You will not thwart Tiamat's plans!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_33
string.body: You're too late...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_34
string.body: It is futile. But our fate will reunite us.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_35
string.body: Die, Balaur!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_36
string.body: Argh! I...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_37
string.body: What... is it...?

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_38
string.body: You dare to defy me?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_39
string.body: If only you had stayed at home...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_40
string.body: Resistance is futile!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_U01_Ra_Goossip_01
string.body: Why are you following me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_U01_Ra_Goossip_02
string.body: Don't hold me up!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_U01_Ra_Goossip_03
string.body: You are tenacious. But so am I!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_U01_Ra_Goossip_04
string.body: Ridiculous! I'll show you what I can do!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_U01_Ra_Goossip_05
string.body: Farewell!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Human_Gossip_01
string.body: How dare you stand up to me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Human_Gossip_02
string.body: Nice try.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Human_Gossip_03
string.body: Expect no mercy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Human_Gossip_04
string.body: You're not a worthy opponent.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Human_Gossip_05
string.body: Ridiculous...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Human_Gossip_06
string.body: Astonishing... but you can't win.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Human_Gossip_07
string.body: How tedious.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Human_Gossip_08
string.body: Is that all you can do?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Human_Gossip_09
string.body: What a waste of time...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Human_Gossip_10
string.body: Anything you try will be futile!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDYun_RastaEvent_Gossip_01
string.body: Daeva, use the artillery to attack Xasta!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F4_Rotation_Buff_01_WakeUp
string.body: Shugo has hidden as he is afraid of the monsters, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_F4_Rotation_Buff_01_Talked
string.body: I will give you a gift as a token of my gratitude, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_F4_Rotation_Buff_02_WakeUp
string.body: Daeva is a good hunter, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_F4_Rotation_Buff_02_Talked
string.body: Shugo will help you, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_F4_Rotation_Buff_03_WakeUp
string.body: The monsters threatened me, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_F4_Rotation_Buff_03_Talked
string.body: Thanks be to Daeva, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Gossip_41
string.body: You have planted the seed well.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_U01_Ra_Goossip_06
string.body: I must hurry!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_U01_Ra_Goossip_07
string.body: Why is it so cold here?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF5_U01_Ra_Goossip_08
string.body: Beritra will win!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_41
string.body: Muel... please don't forget me...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_42
string.body: You are blinded by your greed for the treasure, but now it's over!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_43
string.body: How dare you lust after our treasure?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_44
string.body: The crystal belongs to us!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_45
string.body: Stop the Daevas!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_46
string.body: This will be the end of you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_47
string.body: Your end is near!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_48
string.body: Pathetic Daevas!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_49
string.body: You deserve to die!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_50
string.body: Don't let them steal from us!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_51
string.body: You too shall bow down before Beritra!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_52
string.body: This far, and no further!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Goossip_53
string.body: Why...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Glacier_Gossip_01
string.body: Here comes the cold snap!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Immortal_Gossip_01
string.body: Ereshkigal will protect me.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Immortal_Gossip_02
string.body: Expect no mercy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Immortal_Gossip_03
string.body: My power... is out of control!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Immortal_Gossip_04
string.body: Like taking candy from a baby.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Immortal_Gossip_05
string.body: Ereshkigal's protection... I can't feel it any more!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Immortal_Gossip_06
string.body: Ereshkigal!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Bomber_01_Idle_b
string.body: Leave it to me; I'll get rid of the traps!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Bomber_Gossip_01
string.body: These traps can be rendered harmless in no time!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Bomber_Gossip_02
string.body: Once the trap has exploded you can continue.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Bomber_02_Idle_b
string.body: Now you can continue.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Bomber_Gossip_03
string.body: I can't detonate this trap because it's protected by the Power of Darkness!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_QuestNPC_01_Idle_b
string.body: Take care of yourself.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_QuestNPC_02_Idle_b
string.body: Thanks to you, the patrol was able to advance without any damage. Good job, Daeva.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_QuestNPC_03_Idle_b
string.body: The patrol suffered a little damage, but remains intact.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_QuestNPC_04_Idle_b
string.body: It has suffered substantial damage. We need to check whether the patrol can continue to fight.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_QuestNPC_Gossip_01
string.body: It's about time to give a show of strength!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_QuestNPC_Gossip_02
string.body: The darkness is stopping us from advancing. We're preparing the siege weapons!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_QuestNPC_Gossip_03
string.body: Hold the position until the artillery has been loaded!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_QuestNPC_Gossip_04
string.body: Shoot at will!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_QuestNPC_05_Idle_b
string.body: If we join forces we will destroy Beritra!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_QuestNPC_06_Idle_b
string.body: The patrol is a little battered, but can still fight on.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_QuestNPC_07_Idle_b
string.body: I'm sorry, but we can't fight any more.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_QuestNPC_08_Idle_b
string.body: Our strength is depleted, but we'll give it our best shot.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_QuestNPC_09_Idle_b
string.body: We need to check whether we can still fight. We will support you with all our remaining strength!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_QuestNPC_10_Idle_b
string.body: Beritra got away, but Makarna is under our control.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_QuestNPC_11_Idle_b
string.body: Beritra has gone! Although we didn't defeat him, this is still a major victory.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_GuardLeader_01_Idle_b
string.body: Be careful! We'll help you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_GuardLeader_02_Kcast1_b
string.body: We'll destroy the energy source!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_GuardLeader_03_Idle_b
string.body: We'll support you if the situation becomes critical!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_GuardLeader_04_Kcast1_b
string.body: I'll seal the energy source!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_GuardLeader_05_Kcast1_b
string.body: We'll thwart Beritra's plans!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_GuardLeader_06_Die
string.body: Arrgh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_PCGuard_01_Idle_b
string.body: The less damage we suffer, the better our chances against Beritra.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_PCGuard_02_Idle_b
string.body: We're advancing!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_PCGuard_03_Idle_b
string.body: We'll seize control of Makarna!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_PCGuard_04_Idle_b
string.body: The damage is greater than expected...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_PCGuard_05_Idle_b
string.body: I never would've guessed we would suffer such major damage!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Dragon_Gossip_01
string.body: This is starting to be fun.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Dragon_Gossip_02
string.body: How dare you get in my way?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Dragon_Gossip_03
string.body: You will squirm in pain!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Dragon_Gossip_04
string.body: Pesky Daevas!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Dragon_Gossip_05
string.body: Oh, the Daevas are fighting back...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Dragon_Gossip_06
string.body: The darkness will surround you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Dragon_Gossip_07
string.body: Feel my power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Dragon_Gossip_08
string.body: You have no chance.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Dragon_Gossip_09
string.body: This will be the end of you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Twin_P_Gossip_05
string.body: My energy source! How dare you?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Twin_M_Gossip_06
string.body: My energy source! How dare you?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Vritra_Human_Gossip_11
string.body: You're questioning my superiority?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F4_Treasure_Tog_Gossip_01
string.body: Grrrr...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_PCGuard_06_Idle_b
string.body: Apparently some armour has an amazing effect in certain areas.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_PCGuard_07_Idle_b
string.body: Legend has it that Makarna is home to a mysterious force that increases the resistance of armour.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_QuestNPC_12_Idle_b
string.body: So, Beritra got away...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLegion_Perfect_Buff_NPC
string.body: I can help you if you want to watch your comrades' battle.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_GuardianChief_EnterAtk
string.body: Intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_GuardianChief_Despawn
string.body: Onward!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_GuardianChief_Die
string.body: Curse you...

string.name: STR_CHAT_World_icefestival_Gossip_Success
string.body: The ice sculpture is a great success!

string.name: STR_CHAT_World_icefestival_Gossip_Fail
string.body: Oh, the ice sculpture has shattered...

string.name: STR_CHAT_event_koschei_Gossip
string.body: It won't be much longer before Atreia belongs to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_event_koschei_Despawn_Gossip
string.body: Argh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_event_koschei_Spawn_Gossip
string.body: Bah!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Adma_Pot_Gossip_01
string.body: Hehehehe...

string.name: STR_CHAT_Adma_Pot_Gossip_02
string.body: Come, I will show you something...

string.name: STR_CHAT_Adma_Pot_Gossip_03
string.body: It's so narrow... Get me out!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Teo_Pot_Gossip_01
string.body: Get me out of here...

string.name: STR_CHAT_Teo_Pot_Gossip_02
string.body: Is anyone there?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Teo_Pot_Gossip_03
string.body: When will the Seal be broken?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Adma_Boss_Gossip_01
string.body: Feel how the darkness engulfs you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Teo_Boss_Gossip_01
string.body: Finally... I am free!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCARROT_Monster_Gossip_01
string.body: That smells good...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCARROT_Monster_Gossip_02
string.body: Shall I eat it up?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCARROT_Monster_Gossip_04
string.body: I won't give it to you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Q_KeyNamed
string.body: Daevas... I will wipe them out...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Q_Undead_Kcast1_b
string.body: Grrrr...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Q_Skeleton_Kcast1_b
string.body: Argh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Q_DrakanChief
string.body: Death awaits those who intrude.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Q_Drakan_01_Kcast1_b
string.body: Nobody... comes past here.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Q_Drakan_02_Kcast1_b
string.body: The end...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Q_Drakan_03_Kcast1_b
string.body: Must... defend the seal...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Q_Guard_01_Kcast1_b
string.body: Hiyaaaa!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Q_Guard_02_Kcast1_b
string.body: Clear the way!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Q_Guard_03_Kcast1_b
string.body: You haven't got a chance!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Q_QuestNPC_01_Idle_b
string.body: You secured the bridge.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Q_QuestNPC_02_Idle_b
string.body: Our agent... We have to stop Beritra!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Q_QuestNPC_03_Batk_b
string.body: We must protect this place.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Q_QuestNPC_04_Idle_b
string.body: So, Beritra got away. I will report this to the Lord...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Q_GuardLeader_01_Idle_b
string.body: We've been expecting you and will stand by your side.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_WorldRaid_Boss_01
string.body: Who dares disturb my slumber?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_WorldRaid_Boss_02
string.body: Ereshkigal gave me an order!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_WorldRaid_Boss_03
string.body: This fortress belongs to Ereshkigal!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_WorldRaid_Boss_04
string.body: Do you want to test me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_WorldRaid_Boss_05
string.body: Just you wait! I will return.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_WorldRaid_Boss_Skill_01
string.body: Power of ice, preserve me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_WorldRaid_01
string.body: Aaaaaargh!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_WorldRaid_02
string.body: Grrrr...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDDF3_T_Boss_Gossip_01
string.body: Nobody can stop Beritra!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Q_Boss_Teleport_01
string.body: I will send you to the Dungeon of Torment.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLF1_Vanq_Comad_Gossip_01
string.body: It's not enough...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLF1_Vanq_Comad_Gossip_02
string.body: I need a stronger Balaur!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLF1_Vanq_Comad_Gossip_03
string.body: Now I can seize power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_event_toy_bear_Gossip
string.body: Hey, you there! Come and press the button on my tummy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Shugo_AB1_30_Gossip_01
string.body: The merchant for Balic designs has moved to the lower fortress, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Shugo_AB1_30_Gossip_02
string.body: Balic designs are sold in the lower part of the fortress, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Shugo_AB1_30_Gossip_03
string.body: The Balic merchants and Relic Administrators have moved further down, akakak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_event_toy_01_Gossip
string.body: Hairunerk...

string.name: STR_CHAT_event_toy_02_Gossip
string.body: Hairinerk...

string.name: STR_CHAT_event_toy_03_Gossip
string.body: Give us a bonus card...

string.name: STR_CHAT_event_lucky_01_Gossip
string.body: Shugo must flee, nyerk! Make your purchase before I go, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_event_lucky_02_Gossip
string.body: Shugo has no time. Must go, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_event_lucky_03_Gossip
string.body: Candies... Shugo wants candies, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_G1_Event_DFBoss_Gossip_01
string.body: Enemies on the move! Destroy them!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_G2_Event_Boss_Gossip_01
string.body: The reconnaissance is done. The fleet must depart at once!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF3_GrandRVR_DefBoss_01
string.body: Take care of the rest. I'll stop the Balaur!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF3_GrandRVR_AtkBoss_01
string.body: Next time, we will be victorious!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF3_GrandRVR_DefBoss_02
string.body: The plan failed. Everyone pull back!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF3_GrandRVR_AtkBoss_02
string.body: That's enough for today. Let's pull back!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Officer_01
string.body: There are earthquakes and typhoons all over Atreia. The weather is changing. You should take particular care if you want to travel to distant places.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Officer_02
string.body: New books have arrived at the Library of the Sages in Sanctum. You shouldn't just train your body alone, but your mind too!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Officer_03
string.body: More and more Rifts have been opening up in Atreia lately. We still haven't been able to find out why. We're asking you to be careful and return to Sanctum if you can.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Officer_04
string.body: The Asmodians' provocations have increased lately, the safety of the Elyos is in danger. Lady Ariel and Sanctum will not accept this.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Officer_05
string.body: Countless propaganda leaflets are appearing all over Elysea. If one should fall into your hands, destroy it immediately and don't let yourself be influenced by the false information.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Officer_06
string.body: Lady Ariel's Agent will soon begin looking for members for an elite legion. Capable Daevas may apply.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Officer_07
string.body: The book titled "Our Creator's Eternal Slumber" deals with the story of Aion from a different viewpoint. But it's heavily disputed.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Conversation_01
string.body: Oh, my beloved... ♪

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Conversation_02
string.body: That song again?

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Conversation_03
string.body: You haven't gained the experience of love and sorrow that this song talks about. Callow youth...

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Conversation_04
string.body: Sing something else!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Conversation_05
string.body: Then I'll sing the epic of the forgotten hero, how about that?

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Conversation_06
string.body: Fine, go ahead then.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Conversation_07
string.body: There once was a hero chosen by Aion... ♪ His name was...

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Conversation_08
string.body: That sounds awful. Please stop!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Conversation_09
string.body: How tactless!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Prophet_01
string.body: A terrible fate will soon befall us. You cannot stop it. Face it with your head held high!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Prophet_02
string.body: An unholy star hangs over you. It is up to you to decide whether you can avoid your fate.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Prophet_03
string.body: Your reflection doesn't reveal everything. More slumbers within you than you'd like to believe.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Prophet_04
string.body: Every step that you take from here on out will lead you closer to your fate. Be careful!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Prophet_05
string.body: Do not trust what your eyes perceive. The truth lies within you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Prophet_06
string.body: Start writing your future now. It's in your hands Daeva!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_LC1_Prophet_07
string.body: The change is coming! Be warned, Daeva!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Officer_01
string.body: There are earthquakes and typhoons all over Atreia. The weather is changing. You should take particular care if you want to travel to distant places.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Officer_02
string.body: New books have arrived in the Temple of Knowledge in Pandaemonium. You shouldn't just train your body alone, but your mind too!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Officer_03
string.body: More and more Rifts have been opening up in Atreia lately. We still haven't been able to find out why. We're asking you to be careful and return to Pandaemonium if you can.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Officer_04
string.body: The Elyos provocations have increased lately, the safety of the Asmodians is in danger. Lord Azphel and Pandaemonium will not accept this for a second.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Officer_05
string.body: Countless propaganda leaflets are appearing all over Asmodae. If one should fall into your hands, destroy it immediately and don't let yourself be influenced by the false information.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Officer_06
string.body: Lord Azphel's Agent will soon begin looking for members for an elite legion. Capable Daevas may apply.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Officer_07
string.body: The book titled "Our Creator's Eternal Slumber" deals with the story of Aion from a different viewpoint. But it's heavily disputed.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Conversation_01
string.body: A villager travelled to the big city once... ♪

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Conversation_02
string.body: That song again? I can't bear to hear it any more. Sing something else!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Conversation_03
string.body: I admit, I sing it a lot. It's indescribably beautiful!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Conversation_04
string.body: Sing something else!!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Conversation_05
string.body: Then I'll sing the epic of the forgotten hero, how about that?

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Conversation_06
string.body: Fine, go ahead then.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Conversation_07
string.body: There once was a hero chosen by Aion... ♪ His name was...

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Conversation_08
string.body: That sounds awful. Please stop!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Conversation_09
string.body: How rude!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Prophet_01
string.body: A terrible fate will soon befall us. You cannot stop it. Face it with your head held high!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Prophet_02
string.body: An unholy star hangs over you. It is up to you to decide whether you can avoid your fate.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Prophet_03
string.body: Your reflection doesn't reveal everything. More slumbers within you than you'd like to believe.

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Prophet_04
string.body: Every step that you take from here on out will lead you closer to your fate. Be careful!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Prophet_05
string.body: Do not trust what your eyes perceive. The truth lies within you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Prophet_06
string.body: Start writing your future now. It's in your hands Daeva!

string.name: STR_CHAT_HighDeva_DC1_Prophet_07
string.body: The change is coming! Be warned, Daeva!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF3_GrandRVR_DefBoss_03
string.body: I think they've retreated...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_01_OPEN
string.body: The door is open. Enter!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_Q_HighDeva_M_01
string.body: Have you still not regained your memories? I'll give you a helping hand.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_Q_HighDeva_M_02
string.body: Tiamat, extinguish their souls!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_Q_HighDeva_M_03
string.body: Wave of fate, wash them away!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_Q_HighDeva_M_04
string.body: Rise, storm of wrath!

string.body: Have you still not regained your memories? I'll give you a helping hand.

string.body: Anyone who gets in our way will die!

string.body: Not bad at all.

string.body: You can't hide!

string.body: Guards! Seize the intruder!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_Q_Leibo_02
string.body: Intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_Q_Leibo_03
string.body: It's you?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_Q_Leibo_04
string.body: Stop following me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_Q_Leibo_05
string.body: I couldn't complete the seal and now I'm leaving...

string.body: You're not allowed through here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_Q_Sado_Fi_N_02_01
string.body: You're not allowed through here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_Q_Sado_Fi_N_02_02
string.body: It's not over yet!

string.body: You're not allowed through here!

string.body: It's not over yet!

string.body: You're not allowed through here!
