string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_Q_Leibo_06
string.body: Guards, stop the intruder!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_Q_Leibo_07
string.body: Guards! Intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_Q_Leibo_08
string.body: Stop following me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Free_Guard_Gossip_01
string.body: Thank you for saving me.

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Free_Guard_Gossip_02
string.body: I thought my final hour had come.

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Free_Guard_Gossip_03
string.body: Am I still alive?

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Event_G1_Da_Boss_Spawn_Gossip_01
string.body: Your disobedience will be punished!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Event_G1_Da_Boss_Spawn_Gossip_02
string.body: Show the Elyos what we Asmodians are capable of!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Event_G1_Da_Boss_Spawn_Gossip_03
string.body: Don't give up! Azphel will be with us.

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Event_G1_Li_Boss_Spawn_Gossip_01
string.body: We Elyos will be victorious. Your resistance is futile!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Event_G1_Li_Boss_Spawn_Gossip_02
string.body: You should know you can't win this fight!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Event_G1_Li_Boss_Spawn_Gossip_03
string.body: Don't deny your destiny. Today is the day you die!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Event_G1_Da_Boss_Change_Gossip_01
string.body: Azphel give me strength!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Event_G1_Li_Boss_Change_Gossip_01
string.body: Ariel, punish these Asmodians!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_Soldier_Q_01_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Over here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_Soldier_Kn_N_An_01_GOSSIP_01
string.body: For peace!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_NPC_GOSSIP_03
string.body: I can fight again!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S1_Shulack_Fi_An_01_Gossip_01
string.body: I will destroy everything!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S1_Shulack_Gu_An_01_Gossip_01
string.body: Fire! Fire! Fire!

string.name: STR_CHAT_event_ppobarung_01_Gossip
string.body: Try out my new invention.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF6_LF1_Help_GOSSIP_01
string.body: We absolutely have to have the Thorny Tentacle Traps from the supply chest for this task.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF6_LF1_Help_GOSSIP_02
string.body: Whoever has the Thorny Tentacle Traps please follow me. Everyone else take care of destroying the barricade!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF6_LF1_Help_GOSSIP_03
string.body: Everyone else grab a surveillance device and head over to the left!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF6_LF1_Help_GOSSIP_04
string.body: Please set up the Thorny Tentacle Traps here.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF6_LF1_Help_GOSSIP_05
string.body: I'll stop Anuhart. Please catch up with your comrades.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF6_LF1_Help_GOSSIP_06
string.body: Is it not possible to kill Anuhart?

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Free_Dejabobo_Gossip_01
string.body: You're late! Go around the corner there and you'll find an Aether Fragment.

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Free_Dejabobo_Gossip_02
string.body: I thought you were dead. You'll find pure Aether Fragments near the Mumuki building. Go ahead and secure the fragments!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Free_Dejabobo_Gossip_03
string.body: No... energy... Can't... do any more... You go ahead...

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Free_Wizabobo_Gossip_01
string.body: You're late! Go around the corner there and you'll find an Aether Fragment.

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Free_Wizabobo_Gossip_02
string.body: I thought you were dead. You'll find pure Aether Fragments near the Zenzen building. You go ahead. Secure the fragments!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Free_Wizabobo_Gossip_03
string.body: No... energy... Can't... do any more... You go ahead...

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Guardian_Gossip_01
string.body: You have discovered a Fragment of the Tower of Eternity! We'll take care of the rest, you go to the next location.

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Guardian_Gossip_02
string.body: You don't appear to be injured. We'll take care of the rest, go to the next location!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Guardian_Gossip_03
string.body: Luckily you're OK! The agent is looking for you. We'll take care of the rest, go to Ariel's Refuge.

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Archon_Gossip_01
string.body: You have discovered a Fragment of the Tower of Eternity! We'll take care of the rest, go to the next location.

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Archon_Gossip_02
string.body: You don't appear to be injured. We'll take care of the rest, go to the next location!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6_Archon_Gossip_03
string.body: Luckily you're OK! The agent is looking for you. We'll take care of the rest, go to Ariel's Refuge.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF6_LF1_Alarm_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Intruders detected. Accelerated mode will be activated when Anuhart arrives.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Nepilim_Sun_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Jotuns! Attack! They mustn't make it to our lords!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Tower_Nmd_01
string.body: Intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Nepilim_Nmd_01
string.body: Don't think you're getting out of here alive!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Nepilim_Nmd_02
string.body: Start the attack!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Nepilim_Nmd_03
string.body: I'll show you the meaning of true power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Nepilim_Nmd_04
string.body: A major attack!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Nepilim_Nmd_05
string.body: Argh... Is this the end?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Snake_Nmd_01
string.body: I'll snuff you out!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Snake_Nmd_02
string.body: A pathetic attempt.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Snake_Nmd_03
string.body: I know no mercy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Snake_Nmd_04
string.body: The prophecy is true...?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Nepilim_01
string.body: I hope it's not too late.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Nepilim_02
string.body: I'll deal you a knock-out blow!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Nepilim_03
string.body: I will block this attack. Dodge this!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5_Under_02_War_Shugo_Fix_Gossip
string.body: Repairs must be completed to my full satisfaction, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5_Under_02_War_Shugo_Worker_Gossip
string.body: Get to work, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5_Under_02_War_Ratman_Sleep
string.body: Zzzz... Zzzz...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF5_Under_02_War_Brownie_Worker_Gossip
string.body: So much to do!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_polymorph_end_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Thank you. I only woke up because of you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_polymorph_end_GOSSIP_02
string.body: I can help by opening the path to the Contaminated Library.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Nepilim_Key_GOSSIP_01
string.body: If you defeat me I will grant you entry!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Tower_Key_GOSSIP_01
string.body: The locking mechanism that locks the entrance to the 3rd Contaminated Library has been activated. Destroy it in order to open the doorway to the Cliff of Annihilation.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Event_Guard_GOSSIP_01
string.body: I'm going to join the Vanguard again. Be careful, the protective shield has disappeared.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Nepilim_Earth_GOSSIP_01
string.body: I won't give up that easily.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Nepilim_Earth_GOSSIP_02
string.body: I firmly believe there's still hope. Argh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_D_Guard_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Please help me to destroy the Kisk.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_D_Guard_GOSSIP_02
string.body: Our enemies are on their the way here. I'm going to call for reinforcements.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Event_Guard_GOSSIP_02
string.body: Please help me. Then I'll retreat.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Start_Guard_GOSSIP_01
string.body: I've been expecting you. I'm going to deactivate the Protective Shield.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Nepilim_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Thanks. We'll meet in the Connecting Hall in the Library.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_Soldier_Fi_An_01_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Let's go!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_Soldier_Ra_An_01_GOSSIP_01
string.body: I don't want to...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_Soldier_As_An_01_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Shall we have a little fun?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S1_Shulack_As_An_01_Gossip_01
string.body: I will make you my slave!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S1_Shulack_As_An_02_Gossip_01
string.body: We cannot allow the enemy to take the cannons!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S1_Shulack_Ri_SN_Ae_02_Gossip_01
string.body: We're following Mechanerk!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S1_Shulack_Ri_SN_Ae_03_Gossip_01
string.body: You're just jealous because he thinks I'm pretty!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S1_Shulack_Ri_SN_Ae_02_Gossip_02
string.body: Why the hate for Mechanerk?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S1_Shulack_Ri_SN_Ae_03_Gossip_02
string.body: Is it a sin to be pretty...?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S2_Tesinon_Fi_SN_Ae_01_Gossip_01
string.body: An enemy has broken through!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S2_Tesinon_Fi_SN_Ae_01_Gossip_02
string.body: Security level 1

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S2_Tesinon_Fi_SN_Ae_01_Gossip_03
string.body: Security level 2

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S2_Tesinon_Fi_SN_Ae_01_Gossip_04
string.body: Highest security level!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S2_Nepilim_Fi_N_Ah_02_Gossip_01
string.body: More test subjects, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S2_Nepilim_Fi_N_Ah_02_Gossip_02
string.body: Clang, clang! Bzzz, bzzz! Ah!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S2_Nepilim_Fi_N_Ah_02_Gossip_03
string.body: Energyyyyyyyyy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S2_Nepilim_Fi_N_Ah_02_Gossip_04
string.body: Madrunerk never gives up!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_STARTNPC_Gossip_01
string.body: You did well there. Atreia is safe for now.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_Gossip_01
string.body: [%username], we have to activate more Aether Cannons!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_Gossip_02
string.body: The stench of their blood is in the air...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_Gossip_03
string.body: How far are you going to keep following us?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_Gossip_04
string.body: No! My comrades have turned into zombies...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_Gossip_05
string.body: We cannot allow the virus to spread through Atreia.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_Gossip_06
string.body: The Defence Tower is under attack.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_Gossip_07
string.body: Please...save me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S2_EMPBomb_01_Gossip_01
string.body: With the fuses the explosives will be done in no time, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S2_EMPBomb_02_Gossip_01
string.body: Free at last!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S2_EMPBomb_03_Gossip_01
string.body: We will be rich, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S2_EMPBomb_04_Gossip_01
string.body: Aaaaaaaak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S2_Bomb_01
string.body: Ah!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_1_Gossip_01
string.body: There's more and more coming!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_1_Gossip_02
string.body: The attackers are here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_1_Gossip_03
string.body: Are they infected Reian?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_1_Gossip_04
string.body: They're armed!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_1_Gossip_05
string.body: The infected priests and worgs are getting closer!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_1_Gossip_06
string.body: There's something in the air!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_1_Gossip_07
string.body: What's that?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_1_Gossip_08
string.body: I've never seen anything like it...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_2_Gossip_01
string.body: We need to wipe them out before they reach the barricades!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_2_Gossip_02
string.body: There may only be a few, but they are tough. We need to defeat them as quick as we can!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_2_Gossip_03
string.body: Compared to the other undead, they are more intelligent and faster. Additionally they are always in groups. We need to eliminate them fast!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_2_Gossip_04
string.body: Grab their mounts!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_2_Gossip_05
string.body: We need to attack with everything we have!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_2_Gossip_06
string.body: We won't stop them solely with ground attacks. We need to find another way!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_2_Gossip_07
string.body: We're still just about able to handle the danger...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_2_Gossip_08
string.body: If you want to live, stop them! The fate of Atreia lies in our hands!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Guard_2_Gossip_INFECTION
string.body: No! My comrades have been turned into undead...

string.name: STR_CHAT_WORLD_EVENT_STRANGEFAN_01_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Repe...

string.name: STR_CHAT_WORLD_EVENT_STRANGEFAN_01_GOSSIP_02
string.body: She looks like she might fly away any moment...

string.name: STR_CHAT_WORLD_EVENT_STRANGEFAN_01_GOSSIP_03
string.body: Oh... My aching heart...

string.name: STR_CHAT_WORLD_EVENT_REPE_01_GOSSIP_01
string.body: What in Aion's name shall I do if they realise I'm a superstar?

string.name: STR_CHAT_WORLD_EVENT_REPE_01_GOSSIP_02
string.body: Lalala...

string.name: STR_CHAT_WORLD_EVENT_REPE_01_GOSSIP_03
string.body: It's not my fault that I'm so good-looking, even in disguise.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTransform_Boss_GOSSIP_01
string.body: This spear will be your fate!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTransform_Boss_GOSSIP_02
string.body: This dagger will be your fate!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTransform_Boss_GOSSIP_03
string.body: My sharpness will be your fate!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTransform_Boss_GOSSIP_04
string.body: The hammer of the just will be your fate!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTransform_Boss_GOSSIP_05
string.body: Why are you resisting like that?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_Soldier_Kn_N_An_01_GOSSIP_02
string.body: I'll protect you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_Soldier_Kn_N_An_01_GOSSIP_03
string.body: Come here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_Soldier_Fi_An_01_GOSSIP_02
string.body: Oof!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_Soldier_Ra_An_01_GOSSIP_02
string.body: Die!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_Soldier_As_An_01_GOSSIP_02
string.body: Haha!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_Soldier_Kn_N_An_01_GOSSIP_04
string.body: Be careful!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_Soldier_Fi_An_01_GOSSIP_03
string.body: Take cover!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_Soldier_Ra_An_01_GOSSIP_03
string.body: You have done well.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_Soldier_As_An_01_GOSSIP_03
string.body: Wait for me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_Soldier_As_An_01_GOSSIP_04
string.body: Oh no!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTransform_Boss_Sound_Gossip_01
string.body: The glory of bygone times will be extinguished!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTransform_Boss_Sound_Gossip_06
string.body: Spear, open the gates to the other side!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTransform_Boss_Sound_Gossip_07
string.body: Dagger, open the gates to the other side!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTransform_Boss_Sound_Gossip_08
string.body: Sharpness, open the gates to the other side!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTransform_Boss_Sound_Gossip_09
string.body: Hammer, open the gates to the other side!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S1_Shulack_Ri_SN_Ae_02_Gossip_03
string.body: A smokescreen!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_SIEGE_S1_Shulack_Ri_SN_Ae_03_Gossip_03
string.body: Eliminate them, nyerk!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Hammer_Gossip_01
string.body: I'll destroy everything!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLUNA_DEF_Heal_Gossip_01
string.body: I feel a healing energy.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Raid_Nmd_01
string.body: A sacrifice for the Ice Queen!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Raid_Nmd_02
string.body: The Dredgion will endure...

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_invasion_Nmd_01
string.body: What an honour!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_invasion_Nmd_02
string.body: I will have my revenge...

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_invasion_01
string.body: Intruders! Intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_invasion_02
string.body: Kill the intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Def_01
string.body: Stop the Balaur!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Def_02
string.body: Do not flinch! Attack!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Def_03
string.body: Quick Strike!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_ShugoShip_Fix_Gossip
string.body: Don't step on it! It's fragile, nyerk.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_ShugoShip_Worker_Gossip
string.body: There's simply no end to my work. Doesn't bother Shugo, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_ShugoShip_Leader_Gossip_01
string.body: The Draconutes have launched their assault. Save Shugo, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_ShugoShip_Leader_Gossip_02
string.body: Thanks for rescuing me. Shugo will repay Whitewing Daeva in kind, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_ShugoShip_Leader_Gossip_03
string.body: Thanks for rescuing me. Shugo will repay Blackwing Daeva in kind, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_ShugoShip_Leader_Gossip_04
string.body: Shugo has not felt such peace in a long time, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Sub_01
string.body: I'm hungry.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Sub_02
string.body: Yummy! I want more of that.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Sub_03
string.body: Whew, I'm full. I'm going home.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Sub_04
string.body: Boohoohoo... Save me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Sub_05
string.body: Thanks for coming to my aid.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Sub_06
string.body: Thank you for saving me.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Sub_07
string.body: Uhhh...

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Sub_08
string.body: Thanks for coming to my aid.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Sub_09
string.body: We're grateful for your assistance.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LC1_DrakanWi_Gossip_01
string.body: Beware!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DC1_DrakanWi_Gossip_01
string.body: Beware!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_01
string.body: Battle is upon us. Daeva should check to see if Daeva has overlooked anything, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_02
string.body: The odds will be better if Daeva prepares well in the Lounge. Daeva should make good use of the little time available, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_03
string.body: Daeva can see the competition ranking by clicking on the sword at the top right, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_04
string.body: Has Daeva forgotten anything, ak? Being well-prepared is the first step to victory, akakak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_05
string.body: It's also important to take breaks, ak. The battle begins soon, akakak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_06
string.body: Daeva is in the Lounge preparing for battle, ak. Here is the list of skills. Daeva should use them wisely, akakak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_07
string.body: The Lounge is managed by the Red Sand Conglomerate. Fights are not tolerated, even if sworn enemies meet there, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_08
string.body: Daeva can see the participant list and competition ranking by clicking on the sword at the top right, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_09
string.body: The fight begins about a minute after Daeva has stepped into the arena. Daeva should use that time wisely.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_10
string.body: A battle lasts for around 7 minutes, akakak. Anyone who has defeated most or all of the enemies within those seven minutes gets one point, akakak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_11
string.body: If both groups have the same score at the end of the battle, the group that attacked the opponent more often wins!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_12
string.body: If it's still a draw after the extra time, the judge will decide according to the rules, ak. Daeva can read up on the rules in the manual, akakak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_13
string.body: It is strictly prohibited to transform into a Guardian General in the arena, ak! Shugo hopes that Daeva will fight fairly and with dignity, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_14
string.body: Items and skills involving resurrection and teleporting may not be used in the arena. Kisks are prohibited as well, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_15
string.body: Daeva can watch the other participants fight from the Lounge. Does Daeva want to watch the other participants fight, even though Daeva lost, ak?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_16
string.body: Daeva can see from the participant list which fights involving the other participants Daeva can watch, akakak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_17
string.body: The reward is presented to the overall winner. That means Daeva will only receive the reward when no challengers remain, akakak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_18
string.body: The more often Daeva wins, the better the reward will be, ak. Train hard to receive the reward, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_19
string.body: Daeva may not leave the arena during the decision. Otherwise Daeva will miss out on the reward, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_20
string.body: If the fight begins and Daeva has not entered the arena after the waiting is up, it will be deemed a surrender, ak. Daeva will also miss out on the reward, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_WORLD_EVENT_NEWYEAR_FUFURIN_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Finally, after such a long time my research is done...

string.name: STR_CHAT_WORLD_EVENT_NEWYEAR_FUFURIN_GOSSIP_02
string.body: My beloved family was struck down before my very eyes...

string.name: STR_CHAT_WORLD_EVENT_NEWYEAR_FUFURIN_GOSSIP_03
string.body: I miss them...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_01
string.body: Hm. Want me to go up there?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_Idle_s
string.body: Oh... How much longer until dinner?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo02_Idle_s
string.body: I want to go home!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo03_Idle_s
string.body: Work makes me hungry.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo04_Idle_s
string.body: Didn't fall over after all?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_06
string.body: I feel like having some Broiled Meat all of a sudden.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_07
string.body: What's going on here?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_08
string.body: What's that?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_Hansel_Gosship
string.body: You must free Poppy as quickly as possible.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_Gretel_Gosship
string.body: Daeva, help me! *snuffle*

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_09
string.body: Intruder!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_10
string.body: Oh, you gave me a fright! I hate it here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_Boss_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Kill him!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_Gretel_Gosship_02
string.body: Please gather up the dried ginseng my brother lost!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_Monster_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Mmmh... broiled meat...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_Monster_GOSSIP_02
string.body: We'll be enjoying broiled meat soon...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_Monster_GOSSIP_03
string.body: You look strong! In that case I'll get my friends, who are even stronger!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_Tog_Gosship
string.body: *woof*, *woof*

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_porgus_Gosship
string.body: Thank you! *grunt*, *grunt*

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_Hansel_Gosship_02
string.body: Thanks for defeating the evil cook!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Solo_Hansel_Gosship_01
string.body: Use the transformation scroll from the support crate!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Event_01
string.body: It won't be possible to destroy Jubeda utterly. But I will overpower him so you can take the Windstream to the Dredgion to stop them!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Event_02
string.body: Aaaarghh! Who dares detain me?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6Radi_Boss_01
string.body: How dare you destroy the wagon! You'll pay for this!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6Radi_Boss_02
string.body: That's them - the ones who are trying to stop us! Destroy them all!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6Radi_Boss_03
string.body: Infiltration complete, everyone ready!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6Radi_Boss_04
string.body: That's our lot for today. Retreat! Retreat!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6Radi_Dark_Boss_01
string.body: We'll show no mercy to anyone who destroys our transport!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6Radi_Dark_Boss_02
string.body: That's them - the ones who are trying to stop us! Finish them off!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6Radi_Dark_Boss_03
string.body: The operation is starting. Positions everyone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_F6Radi_Dark_Boss_04
string.body: What a shame, but we'll probably have to retreat!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_01
string.body: Hmph! Don't hit me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_02
string.body: Hmph! It hurts! Stop.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_03
string.body: Don't follow me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_04
string.body: We are one! Although there are actually two of us.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_05
string.body: We won't die alone.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_06
string.body: Now! Attack!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_07
string.body: Die! This is your grave!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_08
string.body: Stop! We can't get any closer!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_09
string.body: Don't underestimate the artefact protector!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_10
string.body: This is the end of the line!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_11
string.body: You're nowhere near good enough to defeat me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_12
string.body: This is your grave!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_13
string.body: This is your grave!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_14
string.body: Even if you stop me, you won't get far!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_15
string.body: Even if you stop me, you won't get far!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_16
string.body: I'll start with you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_17
string.body: I'll start with you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_18
string.body: Commander...Ooh! You won't get away from me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Gosship_01
string.body: Thank you for finding my treasure!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Gosship_02
string.body: The door is locked, the Balaur can't get out.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Gosship_03
string.body: It's better now. Thank you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Gosship_04
string.body: Oh, my friend! You're alive! I haven't seen you for such a long time...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Gosship_05
string.body: Oh, my friend! You're alive! I haven't seen you for such a long time...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Gosship_06
string.body: Eliminate Kudansha - he killed my son! Bring me Kudansha's Heart as proof!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Gosship_07
string.body: I'm so grateful to you for avenging my son.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_19
string.body: You won't get away from me! Prepare yourself!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_20
string.body: Commander... Aah! You won't get away from me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_21
string.body: You won't get away from me! Prepare yourself!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_22
string.body: Commander, dodge it...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_23
string.body: Commander, dodge it...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_24
string.body: Commander, dodge it...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_25
string.body: Commander, dodge it...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_26
string.body: Uninvited guests.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_27
string.body: Stop them!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_28
string.body: You've come a long way! Stop them!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_29
string.body: Intruders! We must flee!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Normal_Gossip_01
string.body: For the glory of the great Queen!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Normal_Gossip_02
string.body: Who the hell are you?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Normal_Gossip_03
string.body: Oh, my great Queen! May you rule forever!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Normal_Gossip_04
string.body: Kill the intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Final_Boss_Gossip_01
string.body: My Queen, open your eyes in the cold abyss!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Final_Boss_Gossip_02
string.body: Don't you dare interrupt the Queen's resurrection!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Final_Boss_Gossip_03
string.body: Not one step further!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Final_Boss_Gossip_04
string.body: Aah... Stop! Please stop!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Final_Boss_Gossip_05
string.body: Aaaah!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Final_Boss_Gossip_06
string.body: Father... Forgive me.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Final_Boss_Gossip_07
string.body: Aaaarghh!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Final_Boss_Gossip_08
string.body: Feel the wrath of the cold Queen!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Final_Boss_Gossip_09
string.body: Kneel before the power of the Queen!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Final_Boss_Gossip_10
string.body: Cry out in pain!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Final_Boss_Gossip_11
string.body: Queen, protect me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Final_Boss_Gossip_12
string.body: May the mercy of the Queen accompany you on your final journey!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Witch_Gossip_01
string.body: Oh, great Queen! May you open your eyes in glory and honour!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Hero_Gossip_01
string.body: We need to get rid of the roots, otherwise we can't travel any further. Just leave it to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Hero_Gossip_02
string.body: Ugh... My strength is failing me. Help me to remove the roots.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Hero_Gossip_03
string.body: Step back! I'll slice through the roots! Hiyah!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Hero_Gossip_04
string.body: It's never-ending! I'm taking care of this. Go on ahead!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Witch_Gossip_02
string.body: Right, that's it you fiends!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Smigol_Gossip_01
string.body: You touched my treasure! You know what's coming now!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Smigol_Gossip_02
string.body: Hehe! Hehehe! Give me back my treasure!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Smigol_Gossip_03
string.body: Hehehe! Is this all you got? And you wanted to lay your hands on my treasure?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Smigol_Gossip_04
string.body: My treasure...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Leader_Gossip_01
string.body: I'll lead you to safety!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Leader_Gossip_02
string.body: I'll finish you off!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Leader_Gossip_03
string.body: Go to sleep at last!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Sub_Gossip_01
string.body: Please, free me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Sub_Gossip_02
string.body: I'll purify your filthy souls! Hahaha!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Sub_Gossip_05
string.body: My son, I will avenge you...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Sub_Gossip_06
string.body: Oof... Is he safe?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Sub_Gossip_07
string.body: I will sacrifice your souls to Mahorosh!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_01
string.body: Intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_02
string.body: Kill the intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_03
string.body: This is where he was captured. Step back everyone. I'll kick down the door to the prison!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_04
string.body: Follow me to the Passage to the Tranquil Path. Make sure you don't damage the wings!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_05
string.body: Watch out, the Fallusha Army is guarding the Tranquil Path.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_06
string.body: Please save the captured Daevas. You must hurry!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_07
string.body: Daeva, please open the door and free us. The Balaur have the key.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_08
string.body: Thank you. Please save the other Daevas too!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_09
string.body: I thought I was done for... I'm so grateful to you for saving me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_10
string.body: I thought I was doomed. Thank you for saving me.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_11
string.body: I was petrified... Thank you for saving me...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_12
string.body: I never imagined I'd see another Daeva here... Thanks for saving me.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_13
string.body: The Fallusha Army is attacking! Aah... Help!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_14
string.body: You're my saviour. I can never repay you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_15
string.body: How dare you...? Stop the intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_War_Gossip_01
string.body: The battle in Neviwind Canyon is ongoing.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_War_Gossip_02
string.body: Our job is to find Core Fragments.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_War_Gossip_03
string.body: Please make sure we are victorious!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_War_Gossip_04
string.body: Will you help me with my investigation?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_War_Gossip_05
string.body: I can feel my strength returning.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_War_Gossip_06
string.body: There is a fragment in the cave.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_War_Gossip_07
string.body: I'm becoming weaker.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_War_Gossip_08
string.body: I need the Dew of Life.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_16
string.body: Aaah! I can't move. Help me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_17
string.body: This place... is hell!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_18
string.body: Please let me out of here...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_19
string.body: *sniff*

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_20
string.body: I want to go home...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_21
string.body: Daevas who put up too much resistance were shoved into a cage dangling from the roof.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_22
string.body: You can use the lever to save the Daevas in the New Start Cage.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_23
string.body: Thank you for saving the Daevas.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_24
string.body: Intruder!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_25
string.body: Capture the intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_26
string.body: The Sakras are free!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_27
string.body: Capture the Sakras!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_28
string.body: Where are they coming from?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_29
string.body: Don't bother me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_30
string.body: Where have they come from?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_31
string.body: Kill them, for the Queen!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_32
string.body: How dare you come here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_33
string.body: Guard the generator!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_34
string.body: The holy Sakras have turned up!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_35
string.body: Be a good sport and sacrifice Sakrapes!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_30
string.body: Now!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_31
string.body: We'll take care of the Artefact Core.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_32
string.body: This is pointless...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_33
string.body: Now!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_34
string.body: We'll take care of the Artefact Core.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_35
string.body: This is pointless...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_36
string.body: You won't get away!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_37
string.body: My orb has vanished!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_38
string.body: Please find my orb and return it to me. But you mustn't use it!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_39
string.body: Did you find my orb? Give it back to me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Final_Boss_Hero_Gossip_01
string.body: I will destroy the lump of ice.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_03_Gosship_36
string.body: How dare you...

string.name: STR_IDAb1_Ere_Start_Drakan_High_Fi_74_Ae_Idle_H
string.body: Kill the intruders!

string.name: STR_IDAb1_Ere_Start_Drakan_High_Fi_74_Ae_Die_H
string.body: Aaah! That makes me furious!

string.name: STR_IDAb1_Ere_Bridge_Drakan_High_As_74_Ae_Idle_H
string.body: Who goes there?

string.name: STR_IDAb1_Ere_Bridge_Drakan_High_As_74_Ae_Die_H
string.body: I have to deliver this news...

string.name: STR_IDAb1_Ere_Bridge_Drakan_High_Wi_74_Ae_Idle_H
string.body: You think you can just drop by here?

string.name: STR_IDAb1_Ere_Bridge_Drakan_High_Wi_74_Ae_Die_H
string.body: Wretched, filthy Daevas...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1Round_Gossip_40
string.body: Only Clerics can absorb the essence.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_DG_01
string.body: Hush now, you pesky Daevas!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_DG_02
string.body: Who dares to disturb me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_DG_03
string.body: Phew, saved!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_01
string.body: There is an opening mechanism for the Purification Cage.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_02
string.body: I saw a Daeva who was taken to the Punishment Room instead of me. Please save him.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_03
string.body: The Balaur lock Daevas who oppose them in the Purification Cage. And the cage is hoisted right up to the ceiling when they turn the lever.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_04
string.body: Somewhere in the Prison Camp are supervisors with bombs.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_05
string.body: Somewhere in the Prison Camp are supervisors with bombs.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_06_1
string.body: There is a generator on the ground floor of the prison camp. Please destroy it and save the Daevas.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_06_2
string.body: Thank you for saving me.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_06_3
string.body: Someone was looking for his friend in the Dismantling Chamber. Did he find him...?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_07
string.body: If you have the key to the Meditation Chamber, you can open or close the door to it on level three.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_08
string.body: Ghosts are also imprisoned in the Chamber of Penance. Even ghosts have been captured...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_09
string.body: You can easily destroy the Prison Camp with bombs.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_VG_01
string.body: I'll stall them here! Quickly, go and free the Daevas.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_VG_02
string.body: My son and the other patrol members aren't here either. If you know their whereabouts, or if you find even the slightest trace, let me know.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_10
string.body: Daeva, please save me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_DG_04
string.body: Intruders... I need to move quickly...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_11
string.body: Thanks for saving me! Steal the Balaurs' keys and free the other Daevas.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_DG_05
string.body: So, the fleeing rats have returned!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_12
string.body: Phew, I sneaked up behind the Daevas without being noticed. Now I can see a way out! I discovered the Balaurs' treasures on the way! You can make better use of them than I can.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_13
string.body: The warehouse is collapsing!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_14_1
string.body: I will have my revenge...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_14_2
string.body: I can't leave until I've seen Kudansha's Heart with my own eyes!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_14_3
string.body: Did you kill Kudansha?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_15_1_Li
string.body: Motor... Where on earth is he?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_15_2_Li
string.body: We found my friend. Now we need to get out of here.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_15_3_Li
string.body: Motor, you're alive!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_15_1_Da
string.body: Bigachen... Where on earth is he?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_15_2_Da
string.body: We found my friend. Now we need to get out of here.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_15_3_Da
string.body: Bigachen, you're alive!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_16_1
string.body: Oof... Aah!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_16_2
string.body: I can't bear it. The torture wounds are too awful...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_16_3
string.body: Did you bring me the Revival Serum?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_17_1
string.body: Please save us!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_17_2
string.body: Please escort me to my friend's location!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_18
string.body: Thank you, Daeva!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_19
string.body: I won't ever forget what you did!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_20
string.body: Oh, I'll never forget this.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_21
string.body: The battle lasts for 8 minutes. In contrast to one-on-one battles, there is no extension in group battles.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_22
string.body: The battle time is 8 minutes, but things get dangerous after 6 minutes. The ground starts to burn and the dancing flames can damage Daeva, akakak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTM_Lobby_23
string.body: Daeva wins the battle if Daeva's team wipes out the opposing team. If Daeva doesn't achieve this before the time runs out, the team which has defeated more opponents wins.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDInfinity_Gosship_01
string.body: Welcome. Show me what you can do.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDInfinity_Gosship_02
string.body: Fantastic! I've been waiting for a Daeva like you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDInfinity_Gosship_03
string.body: This is your chance to make a name for yourself with the Lord. Just keep trying.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDInfinity_Gosship_04
string.body: You shouldn't have any problems with the next level.

string.name: STR_WORLD_CHAT_PADET_KOBONG_GOSSHIP_01
string.body: Atreia is overpopulated!

string.name: STR_WORLD_CHAT_PADET_KOBONG_GOSSHIP_02
string.body: What use is a new weapon? It's a sharp mind you need!

string.name: STR_WORLD_CHAT_PADET_KOBONG_GOSSHIP_03
string.body: Just shut up!

string.name: STR_WORLD_CHAT_PADET_DRYARARE_GOSSHIP_01
string.body: The Destroyer rings in a new era!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Witch_01
string.body: You are not welcomed here.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Witch_02
string.body: Curse you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Witch_03
string.body: You think you can just drop by here?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Witch_04
string.body: Don’t underestimate them!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Witch_05
string.body: That's it! No more pulling my punches!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Witch_06
string.body: You fools.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Witch_07
string.body: It's amazing you made it this far.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Witch_08
string.body: Don't think this is the end!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Boss_01
string.body: I'll show you what real power is!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Boss_02
string.body: Miserable wretches...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Boss_03
string.body: Oh, supreme ruler...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Boss_04
string.body: You asked for it!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Boss_05
string.body: I'll show you what a simple Brigade General is capable of!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Boss_06
string.body: Oh, supreme ruler, lend me strength!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Boss_07
string.body: Ugh... This cannot be! Our Lady's shield will never waver!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Boss_08
string.body: You stupid fools! Behold! You cannot defeat me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Boss_09
string.body: In the name of our Lady, may the cold void devour you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Boss_10
string.body: You bunch of fools, kneel before Nergal's power!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_03_Boss_01
string.body: Harken to the sweet sound of your dying!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_03_Boss_02
string.body: All bow before Ereshkigal!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_03_Boss_03
string.body: My song... will never die...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_03_Boss_04
string.body: Frozen soul, sing your song!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_03_Boss_05
string.body: Freeze to the very depths of your soul!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_03_move_01
string.body: Prepare for unimaginable torment!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_BossEnd_01
string.body: We're taking things from here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_03_Doll_Monster_01
string.body: Intruder!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_03_Doll_Monster_02
string.body: Away?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_03_Doll_Monster_03
string.body: Hands off that Soul Icon Wardstone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAbRe_Core_03_Doll_Monster_04
string.body: Awaken, army of Ereshkigal!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_SiM_BroadCaster_L_01
string.body: There is a Siege Cannon at one of the fortresses the Elyos occupied in the Upper Abyss to aid in the battle for the Divine Fortress.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_SiM_BroadCaster_L_02
string.body: There are Siege Cannons at two of the fortresses the Elyos occupied in the Upper Abyss to aid in the battle for the Divine Fortress.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_SiM_BroadCaster_L_03
string.body: There are Siege Cannons at three of the fortresses the Elyos occupied in the Upper Abyss to aid in the battle for the Divine Fortress.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_SiM_BroadCaster_D_01
string.body: There is a Siege Cannon at one of the fortresses the Asmodians occupied in the Upper Abyss to aid in the battle for the Divine Fortress.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_SiM_BroadCaster_D_02
string.body: There are Siege Cannons at two of the fortresses the Asmodians occupied in the Upper Abyss to aid in the battle for the Divine Fortress.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Ab1_SiM_BroadCaster_D_03
string.body: There are Siege Cannons at three of the fortresses the Asmodians occupied in the Upper Abyss to aid in the battle for the Divine Fortress.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Avatar_TreasureBox_01
string.body: You require an Illusion Insignia to open the chest.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Gosship_01
string.body: Let me know when you're ready!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Gosship_02
string.body: If we want to get out of here, we'll have to destroy the Holy Tower!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Gosship_03
string.body: We must flee before the Holy Tower is destroyed. Quickly!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Gosship_04
string.body: Let me know when you're ready to flee!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Gosship_05
string.body: We've been ordered to retreat.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Heroes_Gosship_06
string.body: Let me know when you want to return to Lakrum.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Event_Moon_Gosship_01
string.body: Don't hit me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Event_Moon_Gosship_02
string.body: Owww! That hurts!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEternity_02_Guard_Gosship_01
string.body: This is a dead end. Find another route!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_2_F2P_Goship_01
string.body: This is where we attack!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_2_F2P_Goship_02
string.body: This is where we attack!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_2_F2P_Goship_03
string.body: This is where we attack!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTiamat_2_F2P_Goship_04
string.body: Everything has been taken care of here. Now take care of Tiamat!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF1_Quest_Goossip_01
string.body: [%username]! Here! Take a look at this!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF1_Quest_Goossip_02
string.body: Yikes, the Odella is crystallising!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF1_Quest_Goossip_03
string.body: Where are they taking the Odella?

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF3_Quest_Goossip_01
string.body: There you are, Daeva. Hoarfrost Mau Chieftain Hasyaditan already told me a lot about you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF3_Quest_Goossip_02
string.body: You can't read it because it is written in the Balaur language.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_Low_Quest_Goossip_01
string.body: You took the secret document from Chura Twinblade.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDTemple_Low_Quest_Goossip_02
string.body: You took the Petralith Energy Source from Debilkarim the Maker.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Quest_Goossip_01
string.body: You have received Supply Medicine!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Quest_Goossip_02
string.body: You have bandaged the soldier's leg injury.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Quest_Goossip_03
string.body: You have bandaged the soldier's head injury.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Quest_Goossip_04
string.body: You have bandaged the soldier's hip injury.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Quest_Goossip_05
string.body: You must spread your wings and use the Windstream.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Quest_Goossip_06
string.body: I use the Windstream of Gelkmaros Fortress!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Quest_Goossip_07
string.body: I use the Windstream of the Netherworld!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Quest_Goossip_08
string.body: I use the Windstream of Antagor Canyon!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Weapon_01
string.body: Who the hell are you?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Weapon_02
string.body: An intruder has been detected!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Quest_Goossip_09
string.body: You have found the Gelkmaros Drana Sample. Come back now.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Quest_Goossip_10
string.body: You have received a Destroyed Gargoyle that once belonged to Trueshot.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDSeal_Bomber_Gossip_potal
string.body: I have opened the entrance. Quickly, go!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Q_01
string.body: Help me and go to the hidden Ship Teleport Protector!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Q_02
string.body: The protector needs help.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Q_03
string.body: We need to work together to get there safely.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Q_04
string.body: Follow the Ship Teleport Protector and head to the hidden ship.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Q_05
string.body: You have found a hidden passage. Please enter it and destroy Gieda.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Dreadgion_Q_06
string.body: This is a preliminary string. Good luck.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Weapon_03
string.body: Argh... That little Rim gave me fresh courage. Thank you.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Weapon_04
string.body: The little Rim helped me. Now the time has come to pay my debt. I will clear the way for the little Rim.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Weapon_05
string.body: The Bellows Wind Passage is located behind the furnace. I will clear the way, my little Rim.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Weapon_06
string.body: These guys are as stupid as they are tall. Carry out the Queen's order!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DC1_Quest_Goossip_01
string.body: Are there no Daevas who can speak the Balaur language?!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DC1_Quest_Goossip_02
string.body: Hey, you there! If you help me I'll give you some important information. Hehe.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DC1_Quest_Goossip_03
string.body: Daeva, have you come here to die?

string.name: STR_CHAT_DC1_Quest_Goossip_04
string.body: I will have my revenge!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DC1_Quest_Goossip_05
string.body: Don't mistake them for deserters!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Idseal_Start_Gossip_01
string.body: We will fight the Magma Protector with magic attacks.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Idseal_Start_Gossip_02
string.body: We will fight the Heat Protector with physical attacks.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Idseal_Start_Gossip_03
string.body: You must create a group of at least 6 people to defeat the Dragon Lord Beritra.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Weapon_07
string.body: Those wretched Balaur. I'll remember this insult forever.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Weapon_08
string.body: I'll get even with them one day...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Weapon_09
string.body: Phew...

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF3_Quest_Goossip_03
string.body: I received the order from the Bakarma Legion.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF3_Quest_Goossip_04
string.body: The letter that Cheska left states that we must find and destroy the Barrier Neutraliser!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF3_Quest_Goossip_05
string.body: The letter that Cheska left states that we must find and destroy the Invasion Weapon of the 45th Army!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_DF4_Quest_Gossip_11
string.body: Derren... What? Is that a name?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Idseal_kharun_Gossip_01
string.body: I came for the last negotiation. Leave me alone!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Idseal_kharun_Gossip_02
string.body: Help me to get to Tiamat.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Idseal_kharun_Gossip_03
string.body: Don't bother me!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Weapon_10
string.body: Right, that's it!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Weapon_11
string.body: Jotun, stand up and fight!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Weapon_12
string.body: Drive out the Balaur!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF5_Quest_Gossip_01
string.body: The Brax is already on its way!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF1_Loye_OP_E_Gossip_01
string.body: Pernos is waiting.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF1_Loye_OP_E_Gossip_02
string.body: [%username], what are you up to?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF1_Loye_A7_E_Gossip_01
string.body: [%username]! Here! Take a look at this!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF1_Loye_A7_E_Gossip_02
string.body: Something is simmering in the cooking pot.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF1_Quest_Gossip_01
string.body: The Odium is being refined!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF3_SoulFemale_E_Gossip_01
string.body: I'm finally free.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF3_SoulFemale_E_Gossip_02
string.body: Thank you for returning me to the Aether Flow.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF3_Quest_Gossip_01
string.body: You can't read it because it is written in the Balaur language.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF3_Quest_Gossip_02
string.body: You must follow Royer.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF3_Quest_Gossip_03
string.body: You must find the waiting Royer.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_Quest_Gossip_01
string.body: You have received Supply Medicine!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_Quest_Gossip_02
string.body: You must spread your wings and use the Windstream.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_Quest_Gossip_03
string.body: I use the Illusion Fortress Windstream!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_Quest_Gossip_04
string.body: I use the Calmheart Grove Windstream!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_Quest_Gossip_05
string.body: I use the Phanoe Windstream!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_Quest_Gossip_06
string.body: You took the Bloody Greathammer from Shura Steadfast.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_Quest_Gossip_07
string.body: The Klaw incubation failed. Try again with a red Klaw Egg.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_Quest_Gossip_08
string.body: A Klaw was born!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_Quest_Gossip_09
string.body: You crafted Undiluted Drana Toxin!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_patient_1_1_Gossip_01
string.body: Thank you for the treatment.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_patient_2_1_Gossip_01
string.body: Thanks for the treatment.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_patient_3_1_Gossip_01
string.body: Thank you very much, [%username]!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_nute_Q61916a_Gossip_01
string.body: Pewpew!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_nute_Q61916a_Gossip_02
string.body: Gyugya!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LC1_Prisoner01_Q14043_Gossip_01
string.body: Let me out of here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LC1_Prisoner01_Q14043_Gossip_02
string.body: I shall curse you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LC1_Prisoner01_Q14043_Gossip_03
string.body: I'm locked in here. Let me out!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Shugo_c17_Gossip_01
string.body: Shugo doesn't know anybody here, akakak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Loye_Party_E_Gossip_01
string.body: We can do it all, if we work together.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Loye_Party_E_Gossip_02
string.body: We can manage it.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDUnderpass_Solo_Asinelli_Gossip_01
string.body: The Wisplight Legion has already left.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDUnderpass_Solo_Asinelli_Gossip_02
string.body: You need to attack Jotun Square.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDUnderpass_Solo_Asinelli_02_Gossip_01
string.body: I never would have thought the Asmodians would attack us...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF5_Stealung_E_Gossip_01
string.body: The promise was made a while ago, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF5_Stealung_E_Gossip_02
string.body: When Daeva is bartering with a merchant, Daeva must not forget the time, akakak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF5_Liana_E_Gossip_01
string.body: That is dangerous. Please stop!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF5_Viseris_E_Gossip_01
string.body: Stop. There's danger up ahead.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF5_Nimeria_E_Gossip_01
string.body: There's danger up ahead.

string.name: STR_CHAT_STR_NPC_Kaidan_Warrior_Gossip_01
string.body: The Kaiden Krall disappeared into oblivion over the years.

string.name: STR_CHAT_STR_NPC_Kaidan_Warrior_Gossip_02
string.body: Kraark!

string.name: STR_CHAT_STR_NPC_Kaidan_Scout_Gossip_01
string.body: Krraarrkk!

string.name: STR_CHAT_STR_NPC_Kaidan_Scout_Gossip_02
string.body: I will protect Mabangtah, krak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_STR_NPC_Kaidan_Scout_Gossip_03
string.body: For the honour of the Krall!

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF1_Quest_Gossip_04
string.body: Hmm, suspicious tracks... I must investigate further.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF1_Quest_Gossip_05
string.body: There you are! Right, let's keep following this path.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Quest_Gossip_11
string.body: You have successfully crafted the Drana solution! Take it carefully to Mastarius.

string.name: STR_CHAT_DF4_Quest_Gossip_12
string.body: I'll do that. Take the geyser to get to the other side. You'll find Queen Nuenti there.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDNovice_Gossip_moomoo_01
string.body: Defend the lift.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDNovice_Gossip_moomoo_02
string.body: Argh, we weren't able to defend the lift...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDTemple_low_teleport_01
string.body: How fortunate!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDTemple_low_teleport_02
string.body: How fortunate to meet you here, [%username].

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDTemple_low_teleport_03
string.body: There's something going on inside. Let's take a look and report back!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDTemple_low_teleport_04
string.body: Aren't you forgetting something? It would be a shame if we had to turn back because of you...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Weapon_Prigoda_02
string.body: May you freeze to the bone!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Weapon_Prigoda_03
string.body: Oh, frost! Rage!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Weapon_Prigoda_04
string.body: For Queen Nuenti!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Harami_01
string.body: Use the Windstream behind me to get to the Taloc Research Campsite.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Harami_02
string.body: The Windstream behind me will take you to Taloc's Forest!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Weapon_Prigoda_01
string.body: Queen, grant me the power of an upgrade!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF7_Event_Shugo_01
string.body: I'm so... tired...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF7_Event_Shugo_02
string.body: Where are my men?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_Q_01_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Over here!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_Kn_N_An_01_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Kill the Malarkin followers!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_NPC_GOSSIP_03
string.body: I can fight again!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S1_Shulack_Fi_An_01_Gossip_01
string.body: I will destroy everything!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S1_Shulack_Gu_An_01_Gossip_01
string.body: Fire! Fire! Fire!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_Fi_An_01_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Capture the laboratory, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_Ra_An_01_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Onwards!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_Pr_An_01_GOSSIP_01
string.body: Go ahead.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_As_An_01_GOSSIP_01
string.body: This is going to be fun, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S1_Shulack_As_An_01_Gossip_01
string.body: I will enslave all of these incompetent Shugos.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S1_Shulack_As_An_02_Gossip_01
string.body: Protect the cannon!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S1_Shulack_Ri_SN_Ae_02_Gossip_01
string.body: I will never forgive the invaders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S1_Shulack_Ri_SN_Ae_03_Gossip_01
string.body: Wait! Keep order!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S1_Shulack_Ri_SN_Ae_02_Gossip_02
string.body: Malarkin... Help...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S1_Shulack_Ri_SN_Ae_03_Gossip_02
string.body: Malarkin... What are you up to...?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S2_Tesinon_Fi_SN_Ae_01_Gossip_01
string.body: Alert

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S2_Tesinon_Fi_SN_Ae_01_Gossip_02
string.body: Security level 1

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S2_Tesinon_Fi_SN_Ae_01_Gossip_03
string.body: Security level 2

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S2_Tesinon_Fi_SN_Ae_01_Gossip_04
string.body: Highest security level!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S2_Nepilim_Fi_N_Ah_02_Gossip_01
string.body: Muhahaha!! I will make you my test subjects!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S2_Nepilim_Fi_N_Ah_02_Gossip_02
string.body: Muhahahhahaaa! I will destroy everything!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S2_Nepilim_Fi_N_Ah_02_Gossip_03
string.body: I am the ingenious scientist Malarkin!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S2_Nepilim_Fi_N_Ah_02_Gossip_04
string.body: Malarkin will take care of you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S2_EMPBomb_01_Gossip_01
string.body: With these fuses the explosives will be done in no time, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S2_EMPBomb_02_Gossip_01
string.body: Free at last!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S2_EMPBomb_03_Gossip_01
string.body: We will be rich, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S2_EMPBomb_04_Gossip_01
string.body: Aaaaaaaak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S2_Bomb_01
string.body: Ah!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_Kn_N_An_01_GOSSIP_02
string.body: Shugo protects Daeva, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_Kn_N_An_01_GOSSIP_03
string.body: Come here, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_Fi_An_01_GOSSIP_02
string.body: Let's go! Let's go! Yiyaap!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_Ra_An_01_GOSSIP_02
string.body: Shugo never gives up, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_Pr_An_01_GOSSIP_02
string.body: Daeva must really make an effort, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_As_An_01_GOSSIP_02
string.body: Malarkin followers, prepare yourselves, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_Kn_N_An_01_GOSSIP_04
string.body: Pay attention, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_Fi_An_01_GOSSIP_03
string.body: Out of my way, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_Ra_An_01_GOSSIP_03
string.body: Good crafting, akakak...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_As_An_01_GOSSIP_03
string.body: Shugo will accompany Daeva, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_Soldier_As_An_01_GOSSIP_04
string.body: Rescue Shugo!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S1_Shulack_Ri_SN_Ae_02_Gossip_03
string.body: Honour Malarkin!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_S1_Shulack_Ri_SN_Ae_03_Gossip_03
string.body: I'll snuff you out!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF7_NormalShugo_Gossip_01
string.body: Let's get out of here, Daeva!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF7_ShugoKing_Gossip_01
string.body: No one is getting their hands on Shugo's Jewels!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF7_Event_BadMan_01
string.body: Ah! Aaaaaa... eeeeee... Argh!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF7_Event_BadMan_02
string.body: Not bad! Whoa! There you are! I'm going in now.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF7_Event_BadMan_03
string.body: Whoa! Not yet. Leave it. I said stop!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_Alchemist_Son_E_01
string.body: We must enter Klawnickt's Cave.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF4_Alchemist_Son_E_02
string.body: King Myrn is very anxious and is hiding deep inside the cave.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Shugo_CubicQ_01
string.body: What? There's something not quite right with that Bodyguard! Please help Shugo, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Shugo_CubicQ_02
string.body: Thank you so much, Daeva! Shugo needs to find the others now, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Shugo_CubicQ_03
string.body: Hey, get out of there! Get lost, you wretched Worg! Daeva, follow this Worg, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Shugo_CubicQ_04
string.body: Thank you so much, Daeva! Shugo needs to find the others now, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Shugo_CubicQ_05
string.body: Brave Wirrunerk: where is Shugo? Why is it so dark, ak?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Shugo_CubicQ_06
string.body: Phew, Shugo finally escaped from the cave! Shugo needs to find the others now, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Shugo_IDCubic_01
string.body: Phew, Shugo survived! The Shulacks are really tough, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDCubic_help_01
string.body: Use the device beside Shugo to blow up the rock, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF7_Mine_in_00
string.body: It's not working any more.

string.body: Please work with the Pandora Recruitment Office.

string.body: I will reward you appropriately for your efforts.

string.body: Please work with the Pandora Recruitment Office.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF7_Pandora_Main_D_E_Gossip_02
string.body: I will reward you appropriately for your efforts.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_Gossip_02
string.body: How much longer do I have to wait?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_Gossip_03
string.body: Daeva is late, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_Gossip_04
string.body: Who are you?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_Gossip_05
string.body: You're not a problem for me.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_Gossip_06
string.body: What do you want with me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_Gossip_07
string.body: I can't hang around here forever.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LF3_Pandora_OtherRaces_Gossip_08
string.body: Have you been looking for me?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF7_Mine_Guide_Board_Area_Gossip_01
string.body: Whoever passed by here seems to have written something down.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF7_Mine_Guide_Board_Area_Gossip_02
string.body: Take a look at the information board. Maybe there's something helpful on it.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF7_Mine_Guide_Board_Area_Gossip_03
string.body: There seem to be other information boards in the area.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRUN_Reward_Fail_N
string.body: You need one Standard Treasure Chest Key from the Treasure Island of Courage to open the box.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRUN_Reward_Fail_A
string.body: You need 5 Magnificent Treasure Chest Keys from the Treasure Island of Courage to open the box.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDRUN_Reward_Fail_S
string.body: You need 10 Magnificent Treasure Chest Keys from the Treasure Island of Courage to open the box.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF7_Ere_Guard_Gossip_01
string.body: Thanks a million for saving me!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF7_Ere_Guard_Gossip_02
string.body: We'll all fall victim to Ereshkigal...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF7_Ere_Guard_Gossip_03
string.body: Take this cannonball with you.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF7_Ere_Guard_Gossip_04
string.body: Here... take this ca-cannonball.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF7_Ere_Guard_Gossip_05
string.body: Please... set me free...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF7_Ere_Guard_Gossip_06
string.body: Ugh... I beg you...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Info_NPC_01_L
string.body: The entrance to the Gallery of Jealousy is so narrow that only one person can enter.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Info_NPC_02_L
string.body: The air in the Gallery of Obsession is so thin that only two people can enter.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Info_NPC_03_L
string.body: The floor in the Gallery of Desire is so unstable that only three people can enter.

string.body: The entrance to the Gallery of Jealousy is so narrow that only one person can enter.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Info_NPC_02_D
string.body: The air in the Gallery of Obsession is so thin that only two people can enter.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Info_NPC_03_D
