string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Info_Wave_NPC_01_L
string.body: We'll sort everything out. Get out of here quickly.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Info_Wave_NPC_02_L
string.body: Who knows when the undead will show up again? Go on!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Info_Wave_NPC_01_D
string.body: We'll take care of the rest. Go to the next task!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Info_Wave_NPC_02_D
string.body: That should be enough. You need to get out of here before any more undead turn up.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_UndeadDarkFiD_1
string.body: My body is as tough as steel.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_MBrownieFWaCra_50_Ae_1
string.body: You can't defeat me with magic!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF7_Ere_Guard_Gossip_07
string.body: Get all the Daevas suffering in Senekta to safety.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Info_NPC_04_L
string.body: This gallery emanates a sinister energy. Hurry up with your search...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Info_NPC_04_D
string.body: This gallery emanates a sinister energy. Hurry up with your search...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF7_Ere_Guard_Gossip_08
string.body: Go and drive Ereshkigal out. I'll bring the Dragon Vanquisher and assist you!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_UndeadDarkFiD_23_An_2_1
string.body: I'll take care of the intruder. It's too dangerous for you.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_UndeadDarkFiD_23_An_2_2
string.body: How could you do that to my darling Lorenta...?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_UndeadDarkRaD_24_An_2
string.body: You rats, I'll finish you off!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_UndeadDarkFiD_23_An_2_2_1
string.body: That wretched Torben! I can smell the Asmodians from here!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_world_event_edu_spirit_01_2_2
string.body: Even in death, Allimas' countenance is arrogant.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Monster_M_Flyingeye
string.body: Intruder alert!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Prison_Undead_67_An_1_1
string.body: You won't get your hands on our Rim! It belongs to my master and me!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Prison_Undead_67_An_1_2
string.body: Finally, sleep...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Prison_Undead_67_An_2_1
string.body: The master always said it. That people like you would come to steal the Rim.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Prison_Undead_67_An_2_2
string.body: It's finally over. Thank you very much!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Prison_Undead_67_An_3_1
string.body: Are you after the Rim? We will punish you as we see fit.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_Prison_Undead_67_An_3_2
string.body: I can finally relax...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_UndeadDarkFiD_23_An_1
string.body: Argh... That was such a good puppet. That's too bad...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Mine_UndeadDarkFiD_23_An_2
string.body: How... How did you get here?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF7_Ere_Guard_Gossip_09
string.body: You saved my life... Together we'll make Ereshkigal pay!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Ere_Named_01
string.body: This microbe is trying to stop me?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Ere_Named_02
string.body: Scream in the Bitter Ice Wind!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Ere_Named_03
string.body: You will pay for your attack!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Ere_Named_04
string.body: Power of ice, preserve me!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDF7_Ere_Named_05
string.body: Who'd have thought my disrupting things would end up costing me so much?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_PandoraRaid_Guard_Li01
string.body: We must protect Rekranon!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_PandoraRaid_Guard_Li02
string.body: Use Rekranon to see off the Beritra Army!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_PandoraRaid_Guard_Li03
string.body: We must protect the last cart!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_PandoraRaid_Guard_Li04
string.body: The cart cannot be destroyed!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_PandoraRaid_Guard_Da01
string.body: We must protect Rekranon!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_PandoraRaid_Guard_Da02
string.body: Use Rekranon to see off the Beritra Army!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_PandoraRaid_Guard_Da03
string.body: We must protect the last cart!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_PandoraRaid_Guard_Da04
string.body: The cart cannot be destroyed!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_PandoraRaid_Guard_Li05
string.body: You won't get in here.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_PandoraRaid_Guard_Da05
string.body: You won't get in here.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Event_LDF7_Raid_01
string.body: Destroy... Daeva... Destroy... I must destroy.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Event_LDF7_Raid_02
string.body: I... will survive... for... Ereshkigal.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Event_LDF7_Raid_03
string.body: The strongest... Scout Commander... Ano... Anomos.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Knight_Monster
string.body: I won't forgive you for forgetting us!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Fighter_Monster
string.body: Didn't I say!?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Magician_Monster
string.body: Why did you change your mind?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_PandoraRaid_Guard_Li06
string.body: We have to fend off Nazra's followers!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_PandoraRaid_Guard_Li07
string.body: Take care of Rekranon!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_PandoraRaid_Guard_Li08
string.body: Take the spoils of war!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDWaterworld_01
string.body: Daeva is here already, akakak.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDWaterworld_02
string.body: Shugo has prepared something helpful.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDWaterworld_03
string.body: A bomb has been planted on the pipeline! Grogget must find out about it!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDWaterworld_04
string.body: Is everything okay?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDWaterworld_05
string.body: Shugo is very grateful to Daeva. Daeva must be careful, akakak!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDWaterworld_06
string.body: I knew it! Guards! Guards! Loyalty to Grogget!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDWaterworld_07
string.body: An intruder has been detected! Grogget must find out about it!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDWaterworld_08
string.body: Enemies! Defend the pipeline!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDWaterworld_09
string.body: Daeva needs a slave key if Daeva wants to free Shugo.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDWaterworld_10
string.body: As a reward for saving Shugo's friends, Shugo has prepared a place where Daeva can rest. Shugo hopes that Daeva likes it, akakak.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_PandoraRaid_Guard_Li09
string.body: In progress.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_PandoraRaid_Guard_Li10
string.body: We must stop the robbers!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_PandoraRaid_Guard_Li11
string.body: Mission completed...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDWaterworld_11
string.body: Daeva need only tell Shugo when Daeva is ready.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDEvent_Solo2_Rico_10_N_1
string.body: All good, Reg? Then let's go!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDEvent_Solo2_Rico_10_N_2
string.body: Let's save poor Poppies in distress.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDEvent_Solo2_Rico_10_N_3
string.body: We can't be caught by the Kumuki or the Poppies are done for!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDEvent_Solo2_Rico_10_N_4
string.body: Those Kunkun scoundrels... what on earth are they up to?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDEvent_Solo2_Rico_10_N_5
string.body: Nobody will find me here!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDEvent_Solo2_Nanach_10_N
string.body: Good work!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_01
string.body: You found the Chests of the Balaur Ancestry that were being transported by Stella employees! It appears that the Dragon Lord Legacy is being transported in a channel.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_02
string.body: You discovered a NK-VI Substance Supplies in the Secret Institute. It contains the same substance as the Chests of the Balaur Ancestry that you found by the entrance. Apparently the Dragon Lord Legacy is used to make NK-VI.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_03
string.body: You discovered the NK-VI Extraction Pipe! The inherent power of the Dragon Lord Legacy is extracted and channelled through this pipe. But where to?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_04
string.body: You found a cylinder with a Balaur test subject! Its intended use is unknown. What on earth are they doing with it?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_05
string.body: Huh? The energy is... overflowing! Uggghhhh!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_06
string.body: Everyone abandoned me... But you saved me.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_07
string.body: You imbecile! How is it possible to be surprised by a filthy mutation? Get out of my way! I'll show you what I'm really capable of.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_08
string.body: *Ugh* I will be even stronger!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_09
string.body: How did you know...? Die!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_10
string.body: The Rega have not shown their true power... Their leader Vishaka will defeat everyone.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_11
string.body: How dare you? Go, leave me now!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_12
string.body: Don't expect a pleasant death!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_13
string.body: I will reward whoever defeats the intruders!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_14
string.body: You show up here with this teenage brat!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_15
string.body: A Daeva and this Balaur scum? It fits like a hand in glove!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_16
string.body: Your level is the same as the damned girl... Hahaha!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_17
string.body: I'm just a little different... why do the Balaur hate me?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_18
string.body: The horrible Balaur... I can't forgive them.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_19
string.body: I'm no disgrace! I'll show them!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_20
string.body: Intruders detected! Passage prohibited. Passage prohibited.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_21
string.body: You foolish Stella, deliver on your promises!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_22
string.body: I can't forgive anyone who wanted to steal the legacy of the mighty Apsu!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_23
string.body: Stop selling Nakisix! It's turning all my friends into addicts!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_24
string.body: Begone, you Stella acolytes!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_25
string.body: I will reveal what the Stella Corporation is really up to.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_26
string.body: One, two... I have forgotten how many I had.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_27
string.body: I will destroy anyone who interrupts me.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_28
string.body: I need a certain quantity. Get out of my way!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_29
string.body: You captured Rega Headquarters, but Vishaka escaped. You met a strange girl. You report to the Patrol Commander.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_30
string.body: I pledge not to steal any more and to lead a righteous life from now on.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Def_Entrance_Gossip_01
string.body: Is Daeva en route to the Secret Hellpath, akakak?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Def_Entrance_Gossip_02
string.body: Shugo would like to know what is in the meteorite, akakak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF7_Sep_Event_Cage_Normal
string.body: Daeva, thank you for saving Shugo, akakak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF7_Sep_Event_Cage_Unique
string.body: Shugo just wanted to stretch his legs... then Shugo got into trouble, akakak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Temper_Gossip_01
string.body: The Empyrean Crucible is waiting for a challenger, Daeva!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Temper_Gossip_02
string.body: Explore your limits in the Tower of Challenge.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Temper_Gossip_03
string.body: Use the Teleport Statue beside me to travel to the Tower of Challenge or the Empyrean Crucible.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_Event_Horror_Teleport_D
string.body: I only teleport Asmodians, POMPOM!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_Event_Horror_Teleport_L
string.body: I only teleport Elyos, POMPOM!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF7_OP_Halloween_E_01
string.body: Waaaah! And? Surprised?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF7_OP_Halloween_E_02
string.body: Come to the ghostly wedding!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF7_Halloween_Key_Ghost_01
string.body: Huh? Where on earth am I?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF7_Halloween_Key_Ghost_02
string.body: I need to get to the wedding celebrations...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDEvent_Solo2_Nanach_10_N_1
string.body: How about a round of gliding, Reg?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDEvent_Solo2_Nanach_10_N_2
string.body: Ginseng is meant to be great for your body!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDEvent_Solo2_Nanach_10_N_3
string.body: Listen! There are some Togs nearby!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_v70_Cubic_01
string.body: You found Kubrinerk's Cubelet in the Holy Tower!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_v70_Cubic_02
string.body: You found Kubrinerk's Cubelet in Illumiel!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Need_Event_Coin_10th_01
string.body: You need 10th Anniversary Coins for Boparobo.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_01_Gossip_01
string.body: *Croak croak*

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_01_Gossip_02
string.body: Oooooooh!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_01_Gossip_03
string.body: *Wheee*

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_01_Gossip_04
string.body: Oooooooh!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_01_Gossip_05
string.body: Oooooooh!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_02_Gossip_01
string.body: Did you know that? Only death awaits those who intrude.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_02_Gossip_02
string.body: Weaklings like you are perfect test subjects.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_02_Gossip_03
string.body: That concludes my research...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_02_Gossip_04
string.body: You dare to hamper my experiments? You will pay for this!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_03_Gossip_01
string.body: Intruders are drawing near! Security measures tightened!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_03_Gossip_02
string.body: Intruders eliminated! Guard mode activated!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_03_Gossip_03
string.body: Warning, warning! Security alarm deactivated! Deactivated...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_03_Gossip_04
string.body: Defence mode enhanced!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_03_Gossip_05
string.body: Try to destroy the intruders!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_04_Gossip_01
string.body: Don't think you're getting out of here alive!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_04_Gossip_02
string.body: Now prepare to die! Hahaha!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_04_Gossip_03
string.body: I lost? That cannot be!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_04_Gossip_04
string.body: No more playing around!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_04_Gossip_05
string.body: Hahaha, you must really want to die!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_04_Gossip_06
string.body: I'll show you real pain!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_04_Gossip_07
string.body: You dare to provoke me?! You'll pay for that with your life!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_01
string.body: Hahaha! You haven't got a chance!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_02
string.body: Kill the intruders!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_03
string.body: The alarm has been triggered.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_04
string.body: Electricity is being charged.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_05
string.body: I need even more...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_06
string.body: Miserable swine! Eliminate them!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_07
string.body: Who dares break into my laboratory?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_08
string.body: Yarkhan! You're always so absent-minded! I'll help you!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_09
string.body: Barkhan! You keep blabbing on and you always come too late!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_10
string.body: Still fighting such weaklings the whole time?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_11
string.body: How unpleasant... Once I'm done with those weaklings, it's your turn!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_12
string.body: Haha... It won't take long!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_13
string.body: How could I be defeated by such weaklings?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_14
string.body: These weaklings are not even good enough for a warm-up.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_15
string.body: Barkhan! I can't watch you fight any more!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_16
string.body: Yarkhan! You stink!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_17
string.body: How dare you...?! Did you defeat Yarkhan? You drive me crazy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_18
string.body: I'll never forgive you for this. How could you defeat Barkhan?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_19
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDLDF8_LAB_Boss_20
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CITIZEN_01
string.body: Are you having fun?

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CITIZEN_02
string.body: How about taking a short break?

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CITIZEN_03
string.body: I'm glad!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CITIZEN_04
string.body: Are you having fun?

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CITIZEN_05
string.body: Yahoo!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CITIZEN_06
string.body: All the best for the 10th Anniversary of Daeva Day!

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_ShugoRobot_01_A
string.body: BEEEP-PEEP. Welcome, Daeva.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_ShugoRobot_01_B
string.body: Have fun, BZZZ-BZZZ.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_ShugoRobot_01_C
string.body: Would Daeva like a new appearance, BZZZ-BZZZ?

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_ShugoRobot_02_A
string.body: BEEEP-PEEP. Welcome, Daeva.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_ShugoRobot_02_B
string.body: Have fun, BZZZ-BZZZ.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_ShugoRobot_02_C
string.body: Are you hungry or thirsty, BZZZ-BZZZ?

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_ShugoRobot_03_A
string.body: BEEEP-PEEP. Welcome, Daeva.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_ShugoRobot_03_B
string.body: Have fun, BZZZ-BZZZ.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_ShugoRobot_03_C
string.body: BEEEP-PEEP. I have some new items in stock.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CAKE_01
string.body: Enjoy your time at the meeting point, BEEP.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CAKE_02
string.body: You have raised the cake, BEEP.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CAKE_03
string.body: You have raised the cake again, BEEP.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CAKE_04
string.body: You have raised the cake even more, BEEP.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CAKE_05_A
string.body: Eggbot is about to decorate the cake, BEEP.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CAKE_05_B
string.body: You have raised the cake significantly, BEEP.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CAKE_06_A
string.body: Eggbot will decorate the cake with your help, BEEP.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CAKE_06_B
string.body: Sugarbot is about to sweeten the cake, BEEP.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CAKE_07_A
string.body: Eggbot and Sugarbot will bake the cake with your help, BEEP.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CAKE_07_B
string.body: Butterbot is about to season the cake, BEEP.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CAKE_08_A
string.body: Creambot is about to taste the cake, BEEP.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CAKE_08_B
string.body: Eggbot, Sugarbot and Butterbot will bake the cake with your help, BEEP.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CAKE_09_A
string.body: Doughbot is about to finish baking the cake, BEEP.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CAKE_09_B
string.body: Eggbot, Sugarbot, Butterbot and Creambot will bake the cake with your help, BEEP.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CAKE_10_A
string.body: The 10th Anniversary Cake was completed with your help.

string.name: STR_CHAT_AION_SEVENT_CAKE_10_B
string.body: Accept lots of rewards at the Lucky Ten Flea Market, BEEP.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Donas_Gossip_01
string.body: A break? I've only just started working...

string.name: STR_CHAT_Donas_Gossip_02
string.body: Hmm, it would be great if they could do their own work.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Donas_Gossip_03
string.body: Hmm! I've got to get away, fast...

string.name: STR_CHAT_Donas_Gossip_04
string.body: The Patrol Commander's work is very exhausting. Regular breaks are therefore indispensable.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Monan_Gossip_01
string.body: Everyone working hard?

string.name: STR_CHAT_Monan_Gossip_02
string.body: Hmm, I'm tired because I've spent all night thinking about the future.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Monan_Gossip_03
string.body: I'd gladly do voluntary overtime if I am rewarded with a promotion...

string.name: STR_CHAT_Monan_Gossip_04
string.body: Ahem! I need to leave to train.

string.name: STR_CHAT_F3_IDAb1_MiniCastle
string.body: What a great start to the day! But you still have a long way to go.

string.name: STR_CHAT_F4_IDAb1_MiniCastle
string.body: What a great start to the day! Keep training hard to maximise your potential.

string.name: STR_CHAT_F5_IDAb1_MiniCastle
string.body: What a great start to the day! Almost done! Five more press-ups! Another three!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_MiniCastle_01
string.body: We'll take care of the situation down here. Go upstairs to capture artefacts. Ah! The main targets of the training are the Drakes, the Protectors, the Castle Gate and the Guardian General.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_MiniCastle_02
string.body: Use the siege weapons to destroy the castle gate and defeat the Guardian General.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_1R_G_15_1_BOTH
string.body: I heard my friend's screams here! We need to find him quickly.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_MiniCastle_03
string.body: Training is over! Prepare for the next training session!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Stellium_01
string.body: I have good news for Daevas who are in possession of Stellium! I'll give you a reward if you bring me Stellium!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Stellium_02
string.body: You can use Stellium, which is issued by the Stella Corporation, to buy various rewards. But you can also use it directly.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Aside_01
string.body: The Patrol Commander is not here at the moment. Come back between 9 AM and 6 PM if you want to speak to him.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Aside_02
string.body: I'd like to skive off... Oh, sorry! That just slipped out.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Aside_03
string.body: Why has the Patrol Commander not been fired, even though he is so lazy?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_GM_Christmas_NPC_01_a
string.body: Aah, you found me!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_GM_Christmas_NPC_01_b
string.body: I'll give you a quest and then disappear.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_GM_Christmas_NPC_01_c
string.body: I'm not the only Clone of Stava!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_MiniCastle_04
string.body: The artefacts are up there! But for a quicker ascension I recommend you defeat all opponents first!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_MiniCastle_05
string.body: Do you want to cancel training? Here is the exit. But if you give up now, this training will not count. So, you should think carefully about it.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_MiniCastle_06
string.body: Your training level is gradually increasing!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_MiniCastle_07
string.body: This is the last training session! Give it your all!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Friend_70_Li
string.body: Timoni! Are you okay?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Friend_70_Da
string.body: Shutoen! Are you okay?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Friend_1
string.body: My friend! Everything OK?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_NK_01
string.body: Will I become stronger if I drink this?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_NK_02
string.body: Hopefully it will sell soon...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_NK_03
string.body: Haha! I'm excited...!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_NK_04
string.body: I'd like to try it out as quickly as possible!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_NK_05
string.body: First things first, akakak!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_NK_06
string.body: This doesn't happen every day, akakak!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_StellraGuard_01
string.body: You have no business in here. Go, leave me now!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_StellraGuard_02
string.body: Oh man... How annoying...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_StellraGuard_03
string.body: Restricted area!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_StellraGuard_04
string.body: Stop! Access prohibited!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_StellraGuard_05
string.body: Anyone entering here is trespassing!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_StellraGuard_06
string.body: You cannot enter here without authorisation.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_NK_07
string.body: Explain it to everyone! Explain it to everyone!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_NK_08
string.body: Where is my brother? He disappeared after using Nakisix!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_NK_09
string.body: Who produced Nakisix?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_NK_10
string.body: I feel strange today... My body...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_NK_11
string.body: Stella needs to explain the situation.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Quest_Gossip_01
string.body: Now, Mahorosh must be defeated!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDAb1_Ere_Quest_Gossip_02
string.body: Go to Lakrum and report back about what you found out in Narakkalli.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LC1_LDF_PvPZone_Teleporter
string.body: Would you like to end the battle and return to Lakrum or Dumaha?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF7_LC1_PvPZone_Teleporter
string.body: Would you like to participate in battles in the Coliseum in Sanctum?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF8_LC1_PvPZone_Teleporter
string.body: Would you like to participate in battles in the Coliseum in Sanctum?

string.name: STR_CHAT_DC1_LDF_PvPZone_Teleporter
string.body: Would you like to end the battle and return to Lakrum or Dumaha?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF7_DC1_PvPZone_Teleporter
string.body: Would you like to participate in battles in Triniel Coliseum in Pandaemonium?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF8_DC1_PvPZone_Teleporter
string.body: Would you like to participate in battles in Triniel Coliseum in Pandaemonium?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_NEED_UNVERIFY_MAP_01
string.body: Cannot be deciphered until the unknown treasure map has been found.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Geag_E_Gossip_01
string.body: This is where the Windstream of the Gentle Highlands starts.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Geag_E_Gossip_02
string.body: The Windstream will take you from the Rega Guard Post to the 2nd Altar.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Rollter_E_Gossip_01
string.body: This is where the Windstream of the Foot of Edoma Mountain starts.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Rollter_E_Gossip_02
string.body: The Windstream will take you from the Rega Guard Post to the 1st Altar.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Leary_E_Gossip_01
string.body: This is where the Windstream of the Desert Relics Excavation Site starts.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Leary_E_Gossip_02
string.body: The Windstream will take you from the Exitus Camp to Drytongue.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Q62902_Gossip_01
string.body: The Snuwa are not evil. Peace is good. Battles aren't.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Q62902_Gossip_02
string.body: Let's talk. Snuwa and Stella. We can be good friends.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF8_Shugo_Amering_E_01
string.body: A Stella employee who has a problem. A Daeva who is looking for work. Stella Problem-solving solves this problem.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF8_Shugo_Amering_E_02
string.body: Hey, is Daeva interested in Stella Problem-solving quests?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_01
string.body: Ugh... Pain... Terrible pain...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_02
string.body: Please... Free me from this torture...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_03
string.body: Who... are you?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_04
string.body: Are you afraid of me...? Then die by my hand...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_05
string.body: I am Tarukkan!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_06
string.body: You are too slow to defeat me.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_07
string.body: Help Tarukkan!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_08
string.body: I will not sit by and let another of my subjects die!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_09
string.body: The body is merely a shell...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_10
string.body: My soul will always keep an eye on you.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_11
string.body: I will fight to the bitter end...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_12
string.body: I will make you the queen's slave.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_13
string.body: Don't be cheeky!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_14
string.body: Pah!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_15
string.body: Leave me alone!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_16
string.body: Heat! Fire!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_17
string.body: *sniff*

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_18
string.body: Fire the water cannon! *pew*

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_19
string.body: Now it's heating up!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_20
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_21
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_22
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_23
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_24
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_25
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_26
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_27
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_28
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_29
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_v70_HardMode_Instance_30
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF8_Jan_Event_NPC_01
string.body: Thank you, Daeva!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF8_Jan_Event_NPC_02
string.body: The Snuwa abducted my fairy friends!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF8_Jan_Event_NPC_03
string.body: Bring me Fairy Drops and I will swap them for something special!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Wave_Def_01
string.body: The Volcanic Ash Research Centre has been attacked by a horde of addicts. I need help.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Wave_Def_02
string.body: The Sand Castle Research Centre has been attacked by a horde of addicts. I need help.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Need_Kina
string.body: We don't have enough Kinah.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Need_cash_sweet_choco_01
string.body: We haven't got enough of Chocorunerk's Sweet Chocolate!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Need_cash_sweet_choco_coin_01
string.body: We haven't got enough hearty recipes!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Event_NPC_Valentine_Shugo_01
string.body: Hmm... So sweet!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Event_NPC_ToyFactory_Shugo_F_01
string.body: Charge the Toymaker Robot with Robot Energy, ak!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Need_event_toy_energy_01
string.body: We don't have enough Robot Energy!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Event_LDF8_Battle_for_material_02_All_01
string.body: My craftsmanship skills are the best in all of Atreia.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Event_LDF8_Battle_for_material_02_All_02
string.body: Invest in me! I'll improve it!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Need_Event_LDF8_Material_extractor
string.body: We need an Opal Dismantler!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Event_5th_StarWeapon_Sale_01
string.body: [%username], come and bask in the greatness of the Wise Dragon King.

string.name: STR_CHAT_Event_Unexpected_Stellaky_E_01
string.body: There seems to an Surprise Attack Monster hiding here! A special Skill Pearl for an Internet café Daeva!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Q62830_Gossip_01
string.body: Let's go to the cliff and wait for Kyle!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Q72830_Gossip_01
string.body: Let's go to the cliff and wait for Lyle!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF8_fightclub_01
string.body: Was that everything?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF8_fightclub_02
string.body: Super! Super!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Q63016_Gossip_01
string.body: Get back right now! Who do you think stands before you? How dare you approach him?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_01
string.body: Unite the Daeva Ranger forces!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_02
string.body: Good work!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_03
string.body: I was successful today too.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_04
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_05
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_06
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_07
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_08
string.body: Gossip (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_nmd_01
string.body: You've come so far... Now deal with me!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_nmd_02
string.body: The master must know out about this...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_nmd_03
string.body: Nobody defeats Bonadi!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_nmd_04
string.body: Argh... How irritating.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_nmd_05
string.body: Feel the power of Nokataki's Machine!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_nmd_06
string.body: No way! My machine...!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_nmd_07
string.body: Who are you?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_nmd_08
string.body: Please... Not the safe...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_nmd_09
string.body: Waaaugh! That's a swindle!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_nmd_10
string.body: This is the first time I've seen them!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_nmd_11
string.body: Daeva Rangers... I'll never forget you.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_nmd_12
string.body: Someone has their eyes on my treasure?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Idsweep_03_nmd_13
string.body: I can't give up yet...!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDF8_House_01
string.body: Isn't the garden beautiful? Shugo's minions are good at breaking branches... and necks! Hehehe!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDF8_House_02
string.body: You're more stubborn than I thought. I'm good! There's a bonus for minions who catch Daevas!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDF8_House_03
string.body: You can't go through here! This isn't the exit! Argh! Stop it at once!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_IDF8_House_04
string.body: Fourth Wave (gossip, temporary)

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF8_Onstagram_shugo_01_a
string.body: If the weather's good, then Daeva should take a photo for posterity, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF8_Onstagram_shugo_01_b
string.body: If the weather's bad, then Daeva should take a mood photo, ak.

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Boss_01_Gossip_01
string.body: Time to celebrate!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Boss_01_Gossip_02
string.body: I'll teach you a lesson!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Boss_01_Gossip_03
string.body: Just a moment... Come on now, don't push like that!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Boss_01_Gossip_04
string.body: This is an order from General Beninerk! Get on with it!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Boss_01_Gossip_05
string.body: Oh... Damn! This is more finicky than I thought!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Boss_01_Gossip_06
string.body: Hehehe... Everything is going according to plan!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Boss_02_Gossip_01
string.body: And now we come to the finale!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Boss_02_Gossip_02
string.body: Shugo will make Daeva disappear off the face of the earth!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Boss_02_Gossip_03
string.body: Just you wait! Once Beninerk is done, Daeva will experience Beninerk's blue wonder!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Boss_02_Gossip_04
string.body: Keep shooting until you start a blaze, ak!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Boss_02_Gossip_05
string.body: A raise for everyone who puts an end to these miserable jerks!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Boss_02_Gossip_06
string.body: Oh no, my precious tank...!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Boss_02_Gossip_07
string.body: No dance – no party!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Boss_02_Gossip_08
string.body: How does it go again? One step back, two steps forward...

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Boss_02_Gossip_09
string.body: Shugo is the star of this party! Hehehe...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_01_01
string.body: Here comes the wrathful rabbit girl, Hulking!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_01_02
string.body: Do you really want to hurt me? Oh... *boom*

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_01_03
string.body: I'm the cutest!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_01_04
string.body: What a pity! We'll see each other again on Thursday!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_02_01
string.body: Enter: Pandehwa!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_02_02
string.body: Angry? No, but that's not my name!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_02_03
string.body: I'm flipping out!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_02_04
string.body: Pah! I get angry on Fridays!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_03_01
string.body: Geboteng from Reshanta! *oink*, *oink*

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_03_02
string.body: I'm boiling mad because you ate my Porgus baby! *oink*

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_03_03
string.body: You'll pay for this! *oink* *oink*

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_03_04
string.body: I will get my revenge on Saturday! *oink*

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_04_01
string.body: I am Iron... erm... AION Man!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_04_02
string.body: You're annoying!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_04_03
string.body: I'll finish you off!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_04_04
string.body: Monday is AION Man day!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_05_01
string.body: Team Leader Otto is on a business trip!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_05_02
string.body: Whoa! Let's get out of here!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_05_03
string.body: Voilà! Transformation!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_05_04
string.body: I'll come over on Tuesday to listen to the opinion...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_06_01
string.body: I am Siero, Ruler of Midnight.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_06_02
string.body: If you don't watch out, you will end up in the darkness!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_06_03
string.body: I banish you to the darkness.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_06_04
string.body: The darkness will come over you on Wednesday.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Baseball_01
string.body: Let's go!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Baseball_02
string.body: Here comes my baseball!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Baseball_03
string.body: Where are you headed?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Baseball_04
string.body: That hurts more than a hit with a baseball bat...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Baseball_05
string.body: That hurts!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_NEED_UPPER_FRUIT
string.body: You have to have a Ripe Fruit for the judging.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF8_Orbis_Trans_Buff_m_01
string.body: Don't you dream of becoming stronger, Daeva? I can lend you strength by using Stellium.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF8_Orbis_Trans_Buff_m_02
string.body: Your development also includes good transformation and adaptation skills. Come quickly to receive your transformation buff.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF8_Orbis_Trans_Buff_f_01
string.body: You lost in the battle training camp? You feel bad? Then get revenge by becoming stronger!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF8_Orbis_Trans_Buff_f_02
string.body: Development means improving your body, your spirit and your transformation skills.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_31
string.body: Are you okay? We should meet up again soon.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_32
string.body: I will wait for you in a safe place.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_33
string.body: I think someone is calling for me...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_34
string.body: They're attacking from both sides!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_35
string.body: That should be enough to get warm. Stop it! It's dangerous!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_36
string.body: Shugo will help Daeva!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_37
string.body: (This doesn't seem to be the right key. Try another one.)

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_38
string.body: (This key doesn't fit either. You have to get the door open before the Rega notice something...)

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_39
string.body: (Done!)

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_40
string.body: (Inanna...)

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_41
string.body: Inanna has disappeared! Guards! Guards!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_42
string.body: Look! I'm still alive!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_43
string.body: If you help me escape, I'll do anything you want!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_44
string.body: Let's get going! Follow me!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_45
string.body: Register (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_46
string.body: Register (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_47
string.body: Register (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_48
string.body: Register (temporary)

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Mission_49
string.body: Register (temporary)

string.body: I'm a joker!

string.body: Let's help the commander!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_Deva_nmd_monster_03
string.body: Ugh...

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF8_AIONFarm_Script_NPC_01
string.body: [%username], are you interested in agriculture?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_LDF8_AIONFarm_Script_NPC_02
string.body: Do you know the joy and satisfaction of a rich harvest?

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Need_Basket_01
string.body: We need a Full Bucket of Water!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Windiel_01
string.body: Oh... oooh... What a pleasant wind...

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Windiel_02
string.body: [%username], do you need help?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Windiel_03
string.body: Carry out the helper mission in the Helper tab in the Campaign/Quest Journal window (shortcut key J).

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Windiel_04
string.body: Carry out the helper mission in the Helper tab in the Campaign/Quest Journal window (shortcut key J).

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_LDF8_Windiel_05
string.body: Carry out the helper mission in the Helper tab in the Campaign/Quest Journal window (shortcut key J).

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_NEED_FOUNTAIN_COIN
string.body: You'll need Wishing Coins and 12,000 Kinah to be able to sense luck!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Need_coin_PC_crystal_01
string.body: We haven't got enough Internet Café Crystals!

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Donas_Gossip_01
string.body: There you are at last! Could we talk for a moment before the party?

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDF8_House_Monan_Gossip_01
string.body: Welcome to the party. Do you have a moment?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_TEST_LEEIKJAE
string.body: Test, Gossip, Ik-Jae Lee 001

string.name: STR_CHAT_IDEvent_Def_Entrance_Gossip_03
string.body: Those rats have hidden on the Hellpath!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Need_cash_ldf8_meteo_hammer_01
string.body: You don't have enough Titania Hammers!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Arena_Entrance_Guide_L_01
string.body: The Stella Corporation supports your training! Come to the Orbis Training Arena!

string.name: STR_CHAT_Arena_Entrance_Guide_D_01
string.body: Looking for a place where you can train for as long as you want? This way to the Orbis Training Arena!

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF8_OP_RingWitch_01_A
string.body: Have you ever heard of the Promise Ring?

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF8_OP_RingWitch_01_B
string.body: Sometimes you just have to believe...

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF8_RingBird_01
string.body: With this ring I promise you my eternal love.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF8_RingBird_02
string.body: With this ring I promise you my legendary love.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF8_RingBird_03_A
string.body: With this ring I promise you my ultimate love.

string.name: STR_CHAT_LDF8_RingBird_03_B
string.body: With this ring I promise you my shimmering love.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Need_event_ring_original_01
string.body: You need a Promise Ring.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Need_wrap_event_ring_ancient_01
string.body: You need an Ancient Promise Ring and Kinah.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Need_wrap_event_ring_relic_01
string.body: You need a Legendary Promise Ring and Kinah.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_Need_wrap_event_ring_finality_01
string.body: You need an Ultimate Promise Ring and Kinah.

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_JULY_PCBANG_BUFF
string.body: Daeva will have fun, ak!

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_JULY_PCBANG_BUFF_02
string.body: Does Daeva come from a special place?

string.name: STR_GOSSHIP_JULY_PCBANG_BUFF_03
string.body: Ta-dah!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_NPC_Dmaha_Qeust_Souling_01
string.body: Dumaha Distillate? Soulinerk discovered that all personally, ak!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_NPC_Dmaha_Qeust_Souling_02
string.body: Daeva will get the noblest treasures if they have sparkly Dumamonds. akakak.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_NPC_Dmaha_Sell_Pamering_01
string.body: It glitters and shines see, ak!

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_NPC_Dmaha_Sell_Pamering_02
string.body: Poumerlinerk has delicious wares to offer if there's Dumaha Distillate to trade, ak.

string.name: STR_GOSSIP_Event_NPC_Dmaha_Sell_Pamering_03
string.body: Poumerlinerk loves glitter and shine, akakak!
